Demo: Sophisticated security to stop sophisticated Bots

On any given day, bots make up 40-50% of internet traffic. They get in the way of business, overload backend resources and carry out credential and credit card stuffing, inventory hoarding and data scraping attacks. What’s more, the attackers behind bots constantly update their attack platforms to quickly circumvent manual IP blocklisting and user-agent filtering.

This is why organizations need sophisticated Bot Management solutions, with layered detections to slow bots in their tracks. 

To equip you with the ability to discern between good and bad bots, we’ve enlisted the expertise of Cloudflare’s Jamal Boutkabout, Partner Solutions Engineer. Join us for a demo presentation of Cloudflare’s Bot Management Solution to see how it spots and stops sophisticated bots in real-time using heuristics, machine learning and anomaly detection.

nodes.title: Zero Trust Network Access and Identity & Access Management:  Making both work for you
nodes.description:
Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) and Identity & Access Management (IAM) are two mutually reinforcing technologies that are increasingly essential to securing the modern workforce.  But there is overlap in ZTNA and IAM use cases when implementing a Zero Trust security model, sometimes in confusing ways.

In this webinar, we’ll share a new point of view on how IAM and ZTNA should work together, alongside other important contextual signals, to enforce default-deny, context-aware policies. 

You’ll leave with a clearer picture of the roles these technologies can play in your Zero Trust architecture. 

Register now, and you’ll learn:

  • What your IAM and ZTNA should deliver, and where IAM and ZTNA intersect
  • How ZTNA can serve as a single control plane to aggregate multiple identity providers within an organization’s extended workforce
  • How organizations are deploying IAM and ZTNA both to secure and to streamline access experiences

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: Browser Isolation:  Extend Zero Trust threat and data protection on the Internet with Cloudflare Customer PensionBee
nodes.description:
Today, the web browser is likely everyone’s most-used application. But with users online more than ever and constantly executing unknown, untrusted code, the browser also represents one of an organization’s largest attack surfaces. 

Browser isolation solutions execute all browser code in the cloud -- far away from local devices. That way, users are protected from zero-day and known vulnerabilities, wherever they browse. Isolation is also a powerful way to protect sensitive data that reside in your self-hosted and SaaS based applications from less trusted users and devices such as contractors or BYOD -- an area where it’s been typically tough to apply controls.

In this webinar on October 13th, Cloudflare will share how to integrate browser isolation into your threat and data protection strategy -- with no tradeoffs in experience for end users. You will also hear from Jonathan Lister Parsons, CTO and co-founder of PensionBee, who will share perspectives on evolving his organization's IT and security strategy and the role browser isolation plays in that journey. 

Register now, and you’ll learn: 

  • How recent innovations have made browser isolation now more accessible than ever How browser isolation can augment a Zero Trust strategy
  • How PensionBee and organizations like it are adopting browser isolation today

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: Supercharge your web development workflow with Jamstack: Part 2
nodes.description: Utilizing the Jamstack architecture is quick and easy with Cloudflare Pages. In this webinar, we will do a technical deep dive into Pages and show how it integrates into your existing developer workflow. Whether you want to connect to a headless CMS, integrate with serverless functions, or just spin up a fast and scalable site, we will show you how it’s done.

nodes.title: DDoS Trends and the Ransomware Threat
nodes.description: DDoS attacks have dominated the charts in terms of frequency, sophistication, and geo-distribution over the last year. More recently, we have seen a surge in Ransom DDoS attacks — that usually accompany or follow ransomware attacks. This can cripple an organization’s attempt to respond effectively to these threats. Join Cloudflare and (ISC)2 as we examine key DDoS attack trends from Q2 2021, ransom DDoS threats (and what you can do if you are affected) and steps organizations can take to make the impact of DDoS attacks a thing of the past.

nodes.title: クラウドフレアによるサーバレスエッジコンピューティング
Latest DDoS Trends and the Rise of Ransom-driven Attacks
nodes.description:
DDoS attacks have dominated the charts in terms of frequency, sophistication and geo-distribution over the past year. Ransom DDoS attacks — that, unlike ransomware attacks, do not even require the hacker to access an organization’s internal systems before it can be carried out — are also surging lately. While there are no signs of DDoS attacks going away anytime soon, how do organizations ensure that their Internet assets are protected against threats of any size or kind?

In this webcast, you’ll learn about:

  • key Q2 2021 DDoS attack trends;
  • ransom DDoS threats — and what you can do if you are affected; and
  • steps organizations can take to make the impact of DDoS attacks a thing of the past.

nodes.title: The Death of Network Hardware Appliances — and the Evolution of Cloud-Native Architectures
nodes.description:
The Death of Network Hardware Appliances — and the Evolution of Cloud-Native Architectures

When organizations need to protect their on-prem networks, IT departments typically turn to old, legacy hardware boxes. These hardware boxes are expensive, hard to manage, and slow. To complicate matters further, legacy approaches to connectivity (re: MPLS) and security (re: on-prem firewalling and DDoS ‘scrubbing centers’) just don’t work for today’s distributed workforce and cloud-hosted applications.

Between cloud app adoption growth and the work-from-home mode of operation becoming part of business as usual, the Internet is mission-critical: to share data, solve challenges, and stay connected. But as the importance of the internet increases so too do the risks of cyber threats and network demands.

Join this informative webinar where you will hear experts discuss the death of network hardware appliances and how cloud-native architectures can help you continue to provide secure, enterprise-class connectivity.

nodes.title: Better Protect Against Client-side Attacks Targeting Customers
nodes.description:
Countless companies have, and continue to, fall victim to Magecart-style attacks. With no end to these hacks in sight, Cloudflare has developed a solution to detect and combat such breaches.

To address these attacks, Cloudflare has developed Page Shield to track all Javascript dependencies, identify malicious scripts and file changes and block malicious scripts and automate content security policies.

Join our webinar with Dan Gould and Michael Tremante from Cloudflare to learn about how Page Shield helps applications detect and mitigate these elusive attacks to keep sensitive information safe.

In this webinar, you will learn about:

  • How browser-based supply chain attacks come together through third-party JavaScript dependencies
  • The drawbacks of Content Security Policy (CSP) and Subresource Integrity (SRI)
  • The benefits of Cloudflare’s unique position between application origin servers and end-user

nodes.title: How Cloudflare leverages our own Load Balancing solution
nodes.description:
Cloudflare Load Balancing improves application performance and availability by steering traffic away from unhealthy origin servers and dynamically distributing it to the most available and responsive server pools. 

Plus, as a Cloudflare customer, you can manage your global and local traffic from one place — the Cloudflare Dashboard. 

In this session, you’ll learn how Cloudflare uses our own Load Balancing solution across our API and services. Listen to the team discuss health checks, failing over instantly with zero downtime, and the key lessons learned during implementation.

nodes.title: Supercharge your web development workflow with Jamstack: Part 1
nodes.description: Jamstack is revolutionizing how frontend development teams think about building the modern web, by offering a simpler developer experience, faster performance, and improved security and scalability. Join us and the full-service digital agency Happy Cog, who works as the web development team for Dig restaurants, as we talk about what Jamstack is, how it’s solving development challenges for companies from eCommerce sites to small businesses, and how you can leverage it today.

nodes.title: Implementing a Zero-Trust Strategy: Lessons Learned for Tomorrow's Outcomes
nodes.description:
In this session, we will be taking a deep dive on Zero Trust with Cloudflare's CTO, John Graham-Cumming and Head of India & SAARC Region, Samuel Sathyajith.

Agenda:

  • A look at the “philosophy” behind Zero trust and its application in SEA and India.
  • Understanding how you can produce security outcomes today for a Zero-Trust blueprint.
  • A look at some real-life use-cases and laying out plans for zero trust culture.
  • How to drive successful Zero Trust pilot projects with Cloudflare for Teams.

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: Extending your network security from HQ to everywhere on Earth
nodes.description:
The shift to cloud applications and remote work imposes fundamentally different requirements on network security. The Internet is your new corporate network and security needs to evolve from appliances and choke points to a ubiquitous cloud-based service. Join this webinar to learn how you can transform your security architecture and take advantage of cloud-native network security-as-a-service from Cloudflare.

In this webinar you will learn about:

  • hybrid network architectures for the modern enterprise
  • the shifts in network security requirements driven by the cloud and remote work
  • how network security-as-a-service can help you maintain a consistent security posture in the hybrid work era

nodes.title: The Impact Zero-Trust Strategy has on Reducing Friction + Increasing Speed
nodes.description:
In this session, We will be taking a deep dive into your Zero Trust strategy with Cloudflare's Chief Security Officer, Joe Sullivan and Head of Australia and New Zealand, Raymond Maisano.

Agenda:

  • A look at Zero trust adoption in ANZ and how this strategy is being applied.
  • Building the right culture to develop and cultivate a secure workplace that can move fast.
  • Responding to the psychology of zero-trust and how to adopt this at a business level.
  • Local use-cases where Zero trust has offered security and utility.
  • How to drive successful Zero Trust pilot projects with Cloudflare for Teams

nodes.title: Bringing Device Posture Awareness Into Your Zero Trust Strategy with Cloudflare and SentinelOne
nodes.description:
Limiting application access to managed, safe devices is a security best practice and a Zero Trust no-brainer. But most organizations don’t functionally limit access today. Why? The real-world implementation can be complicated, requiring new agents on devices, coordination across multiple operating systems, and the unavoidably gnarly effort of integrating with identity providers. There is a better way: adding device awareness at the front door of every resource. 

In this webinar, Jeremy Goldstein, Senior Product Marketing Manager at SentinelOne, will join Kenny Johnson, Product Manager at Cloudflare, to discuss:

  • How Cloudflare and SentinelOne work together for Zero Trust network access with deep identity and device posture awareness
  • Three strategies to limit access to sensitive data from safe, corporate devices - with or without a device agent deployed
  • A reference architecture and pilot plan you can use for your Zero Trust projects
  • How to extend device awareness into Secure Web Gateway deployments

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.description:

  • ECサイトにおけるパフォーマンスの重要性

  • CDNとパフォーマンス

  • Cloudflareのパフォーマンスソリューション

nodes.title: Protecting APIs like your business depends on it
nodes.description:
About This Webinar

Over the past few months, we've gained agility, scale & speed thanks to APIs.

But as you'll be exposed to, in driving rapid growth we've created new vulnerabilities. The latest trends report a surge in API related attacks across the region, and a stream of IT departments that are ill-prepared.

We invite you to join an insightful live webinar featuring guest speaker Sandy Carielli (Principal Analyst, Forrester) as well as Dan Gould and Neil Patel from Cloudflare.

We'll dive into the key API security risks affecting the enterprise landscape, and explore how to strengthen your security posture as we move forward with APIs.

Agenda

  • A dive into the state of API-driven applications in 2021
  • Identifying the key vulnerabilities in your APIs
  • Building an API security strategy that allows for growth and innovation
  • Security in action: we'll showcase Cloudflare's API Shield in a live demo

nodes.title: Scaling the performance and security of your games
nodes.description:
Most gaming companies aspire to have thousands of users playing their game simultaneously. However, supporting this many players at once can create technical strain, especially because latency affects player performance and experience. 

 
Watch this webinar with Cloudflare security and performance expert David Lallement, Customer Development (EMEA Gaming Sector) to hear:  

  • How to protect the players and performance of your games in times of explosive growth 
  • How to upgrade your current on-premise or cloud infrastructure to adapt to a global audience

nodes.title: Virtual Waiting Room: Elevating Your Customer Experience
nodes.description:
The Covid-19 pandemic has accelerated digital transformations. With lockdowns and restrictions in place, it has forced companies to look into creative digital solutions so that businesses could continue to function remotely and continue to serve their customer base. Purchasing goods and providing services online became the new normal. But while COVID-19 has led to a surge in online services and accelerated digital transformation, this has also caused sudden increases in internet traffic that can overwhelm any businesses' applications and infrastructures, leading to slow performance or complete disruption to their online presence.

Cloudflare and Classmethod invite you to join this session and together, we will explore:

1. Virtual waiting room and why it is gaining traction
2. Classmethod Use Cases and how organizations of different sizes have implemented virtual waiting room practices
3. Cloudflare Waiting Room and how it is elevating customer experiences

nodes.title: Techlabs First Game Show
nodes.description:
Debunking SASE & Zero Trust Myths

Follow along as our learned panel battles it out and dives into the nuts and bolts of what it takes to build security infrastructures for your remote teams and how Cloudflare One delivers against the objectives of your SASE and Zero Trust road map.

Join this session to debunk the myths and get answers to your key challenges.

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: Network Security-as-a-Service en Español (LATAM)
nodes.description:
En este webinar, los expertos en redes de Cloudflare, Steven Kettlewell y Adrian Vattuone, discuten:

  • Por qué las aplicaciones que se trasladan a la nube están arrastrando los perímetros de la red con ellas.
  • Por qué el hardware de seguridad de red atornillado se está volviendo menos efectivo.
  • Cómo Cloudflare ayuda a las redes corporativas, y a todo lo que esté conectado a Internet, de manera más segura, rápida y confiable.

nodes.title: Cybersecurity lessons from EVE Online: Stopping DDoS, malicious bots, and other common gaming attacks
nodes.description:
Gaming companies have unfortunately become popular cyberattack targets. The high costs of downtime make them vulnerable to DDoS ransom attempts. And user accounts often have valuable financial data — or in-game items — that attackers want to steal.

CCP Games, makers of the renowned MMORPG EVE Online, are no strangers to this threat landscape. They face frequent attempts at bot-powered account takeovers, and their infrastructure and web properties have been targeted by massive DDoS attacks.

How do they stay ahead of attackers and keep their game performing at the level players expect?

In this webinar, Nicholas Herring from CCP Games joins Cloudflare’s Vivek Ganti to discuss:

  • Recent trends in DDoS attack patterns (drawn from Cloudflare’s global network)
  • How DDoS attacks, malicious bots, and other threats can affect gaming companies
  • CCP Games’ strategies for preventing these attacks — and responding when they do happen

nodes.title: Introducing Cloudflare SOC as a Service
nodes.description:
When something less than desirable occurs online organisations don’t just want to rely on their own team. They want to be able to tap into a dedicated team of specialists. A team that acts and feels like an extension of their own team, that can identify and respond to any situation, and more than that, they want this team to be proactively engaged in securing their business. 

It is for this reason that we decided to make our Security Operations Center (SOC) generally available as a service. Cloudflare’s SOC as a Service (SOCaaS) combines our best-in-class security products and a team of cybersecurity experts within Cloudflare that augment your security and network teams. 

Join this selected customer-only webinar to understand how Cloudflare’s new SOCaaS can benefit you with:

  • 24x7x365 monitoring of your enterprise environments for security threats and operational disruptions. 
  • Triaging and responding to custom alerts. 
  • Performing deep analysis to identify attack vectors and network outages. 
  • Implementing countermeasures to mitigate incidents during attacks.

nodes.title: Securing APIs like your business depends on it - NAMER
nodes.description:
Over the past few years, APIs have grown fast, which has been great for driving business but unfortunately, attackers have found opportunities in it too.

APIs bring a new slate of risks - some familiar from application security while some new- that our security postures must account for.

Join our webinar with Dan Gould and Neil Patel from Cloudflare and guest speaker Sandy Carielli, a Forrester Principal Analyst, to learn about key API security risks and protections to be considered as we move forward with APIs.

In this webinar, you will learn about:

  • The state of APIs driving applications in 2021
  • Key API security risks that are driving breaches
  • Security protections to be considered to keep APIs security and productive
  • Cloudflare will also share a demo of Cloudflare API Shield in action

nodes.title: How Zero Trust Network Access can stop ransomware from stopping you
nodes.description:
Ransomware wreaks havoc by infiltrating user devices, then spreading laterally across resources on the network until it achieves full network lockdown. To stop infection and spread, the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) recommends that security teams implement a sweeping set of at least 24 measures including phishing prevention, vulnerability management, as well as  careful configuration of remote access services like the VPN and RDP. 

 

You can address at least 4 of those 24 recommendations by implementing  a Zero Trust Network Access approach, which replaces blanket network access with default-deny rules in front of all corporate resources. 

 

In this webinar, James Espinosa, Security Engineering Manager of Detection and Response and Lane Billings, Senior Product Marketing Manager at Cloudflare, will share how replacing your VPN with Zero Trust Network Access can reduce the risks of ransomware attacks in your enterprise. 

 

Register now, and you’ll learn: 

  • Real world examples of ransomware attacks, and how Zero Trust principles could have helped mitigate them
  • How replacing VPNs with a Zero Trust model helps stop lateral movement in its tracks
  • Cloudflare’s platform for preventing delivery and lateral movement of ransomware

Demo: Sophisticated security to stop sophisticated Bots
Live Demo - Cloudflare's Zero Trust Platform
nodes.description:
Now more than ever, organizations need to evaluate and modernize their approach to network and application security - with many employees now using unmanaged devices and connecting over unsecured networks, security gaps and performance bottlenecks have become commonplace. 

Cloudflare for Teams addresses these challenges with a single-pass architecture, where all workforce traffic is verified, filtered, inspected and isolated from threats through Cloudflare’s network that is just milliseconds away from  employee and third-party users anywhere in the world.

Come see the live end user experience and walkthroughs of use cases like:

  • Client and clientless secure access for web and non-web applications 
  • Access controls from user authentication and device posture to DNS, HTTP, and Network filters
  • Threat and data protection controls with browser isolation
  • Shadow IT visibility and more

nodes.title: Latest DDoS trends and ransom-driven attacks: What you need to know now
nodes.description:
DDoS attacks have dominated the charts in terms of frequency, sophistication, and geo-distribution over the last year. Ransom DDoS attacks — that, unlike ransomware attacks, do not even require the hacker to access an organization’s internal systems before it can be carried out — are also surging lately.

While there are no signs of DDoS attacks going away anytime soon, how do organizations ensure that their Internet assets are protected against threats of any size or kind?

In this webinar, you’ll learn about:

  • Key Q2 2021 DDoS attack trends 
  • Ransom DDoS threats — and what you can do if you are affected
  • Steps organizations can take to make the impact of DDoS attacks a thing of the past

nodes.title: Zero Trust: Key Considerations for Managing Networks, Users and Endpoints
nodes.description:
The COVID-19 pandemic has exposed the weaknesses of the traditional ‘castle-and-moat’ security model. Remote work has expanded attack surfaces infinitely outwards, and more than ever, organizations need to start from the assumption that their ‘castle’ is already compromised. Zero Trust has emerged as a compelling security framework to address the failures of existing perimeter-based security approaches.

At Cloudflare, we’re making complicated security challenges easier to solve and we’ve helped thousands of organizations- both big and small- take their first steps toward Zero Trust.

In this webinar, explore what the most successful organizations do first on their journey to Zero Trust.

We’ll cover:

  • The Zero Trust framework, and our recommended ZTNA security model
  • How organizations of differing size and security maturity have implemented Zero Trust 
  • Enhancements and product updates
  • Cloudflare’s Zero Trust implementation and lessons learned

nodes.title: Principios y consejos prácticos para definir arquitectura SASE en tu empresa
nodes.description:
Para comprender cómo empezar a definir una arquitectura SASE en 3 simples pasos, regístrese aquí ahora para asistir a este seminario web de Cloudflare en colaboración con IDC.

El modelo de infraestructura de red tradicional (centros de datos corporativos centralizados protegidos por un perímetro de red local) no funciona para las empresas modernas hoy en día.

Los datos que solían vivir en centros de datos ahora se encuentran en la nube y en aplicaciones SaaS.

Con el aumento de la fuerza laboral distribuida, los usuarios necesitan poder conectarse a recursos desde cualquier parte del mundo, desafiando a las empresas a proporcionar acceso a la red y una ruta segura a través de Internet sin adoptar soluciones complejas o aumentar la latencia.

En este contexto, SASE es una estrategia empresarial emergente que combina funciones de red y seguridad con capacidades WAN para soportar las necesidades de acceso seguro y dinámico de las organizaciones actuales.

Si tenéis más preguntas o queréis saber más sobre Cloudflare, rellena el formulario y nos pondremos en contacto contigo.

nodes.title: Trends and Latest DDoS Trends and the Rise of Ransom-Driven Attacks
nodes.description:
DDoS attacks have dominated the charts in terms of frequency, sophistication and geo-distribution over the past year. Ransom DDoS attacks — that, unlike ransomware attacks, do not even require the hacker to access an organization’s internal systems before it can be carried out — are also surging lately. While there are no signs of DDoS attacks going away anytime soon, how do organizations ensure that their Internet assets are protected against threats of any size or kind?

In this webcast, you’ll learn about:

• Key Q2 2021 DDoS attack trends;
• Ransom DDoS threats — and what you can do if you are affected; and
• Steps organizations can take to make the impact of DDoS attacks a thing of the past.

nodes.title: Helping our customers meet their sustainability goals
nodes.description:
Everyone has a role to play in reducing carbon impact and reversing climate change. That’s why Cloudflare recently launched new tools to help customers measure, understand, and improve their carbon emissions: our Carbon Impact Report and Green Compute on Cloudflare Workers, available today to all Cloudflare accounts.

Register today to learn more about these new tools announced during Cloudflare’s Impact Week. Annika Garbers, Product Manager at Cloudflare, will join live to answer your questions.

nodes.title: Securing your investment in Cloudflare
nodes.description:
No matter where applications are hosted, or employees reside, enterprise connectivity needs to be secure as well as fast. Cloudflare's massive global network uses real-time internet intelligence to protect against the latest threats and route traffic to optimise connectivity.

Joining this Cloudflare user-only Webinar will enable you to understand how to leverage your existing investment in Cloudflare services to:

  • Embrace Zero Trust Access, replacing broad security perimeters with one-to-one verification of every request to every resource, irrespective of who or where your users are.
  • Secure your Internet traffic protecting your remote employees from threats on the Internet and enforcing policies that prevent your valuable data from leaving the organisation.
  • Protect and connect your offices and data centres through one consistent cloud platform with Cloudflare One.

Ransom DDoS attacks — that, unlike ransomware attacks, do not even require the hacker to access an organization’s internal systems before it can be carried out — are also surging lately.

While there are no signs of DDoS attacks going away anytime soon, how do organizations ensure that their Internet assets are protected against threats of any size or kind?

In this webinar, you’ll learn about:

  • Key Q2 2021 DDoS attack trends

  • Steps organizations can take to make the impact of DDoS attacks a thing of the past

nodes.title: パワーアワー：企業ネットワークの再定義
nodes.description:
従来のWANアーキテクチャは今の技術に追っていけなくなります。 MPLSは高価で、且つ展開するには非常に時間がかかります。ブロードバンドインターネットは、今日現在のインタネットはほとんどのビジネスアプリケーションに必要なパフォーマンスと一定の信頼性が提供できません。また、インフラストラクチャのデザインもセキュリティを考慮せずに構築されています。さらに、リモートワークの急増とクラウド化が進んでいることにより、従来のWANアーキテクチャに負担がかかっています。 VPNボックスのようなソリューションは、エンタープライズネットワークアーキテクチャの主要な問題が解決できません。


セッションでは、下記についてお話します。
1.　各オフィス拠点とデータセンターのMPLSを置き換えます
2.　VPNを使用せずにプライベートネットワークへのリモートアクセスを保護します
3.　レガシーハードウェアを廃止するする際に、セキュリティ体制の強化をします
4.　オンプレミス、クラウドホスト、ハイブリッドネットワーク向けに、Cloudflareデータセンターから　　DDoS保護、トラフィックアクセラレーションなどを提供します

nodes.title: Power Hour：重新定義您的企業網絡
nodes.description:
傳統廣域網路架構存在已久，已經不再適合現有的網路環境。 MPLS 建置不但價格昂貴，部署時間也極其緩慢。寬頻網路亦無法提供目前多數業務應用所需的低延遲表現及穩定的可靠度。此外，這兩種基礎架構的設計都沒有考慮到安全性。更重要的是，遠距辦公和雲端技術的興起為傳統的廣域網路架構帶來相當大的壓力。 現有的VPN硬體設備解決方案並無法解決企業網絡架構的核心問題。

在本次研討會中，我們將探討：
1. 汰換分支辦公室和數據中心之間的 MPLS
2. 管控遠端員工對私有網絡的存取——無需 VPN
3. 加強您的安全態勢——同時汰換過時硬體設備
4. 透過 Cloudflare 全球數據中心同時為地端、雲端和混合網絡提供 DDoS 保護、流量加速等

nodes.title: Power Hour：重新定义您的企业网络
nodes.description:
传统广域网架构的构建块已经不再适用当今的网络架构。 MPLS 价格昂贵，而且部署时间极其缓慢。宽带 Internet 无法提供当今大多数业务应用程序所需的毫秒级性能和持续可靠性。而且这两种基础设施的设计都没有考虑到安全性。更重要的是，远程工作的激增和业务上云的增加正在给传统的广域网架构带来压力。 VPN 盒等创可贴解决方案并不能解决企业网络架构的核心问题。


在本次会议中，我们将探讨：
1. 更换分支机构和数据中心之间的 MPLS
2. 保护远程员工对私有网络的访问——无需 VPN
3. 加强您的安全态势——同时淘汰旧硬件
4. 从每个 Cloudflare 数据中心为本地、云托管和混合网络提供 DDoS 保护、流量加速等

nodes.title: OMR Roundtable mit Chrono24
nodes.description:
Wir von OMR sprechen oft über Wachstum durch clevere Marketing-Kniffe. Aber was ist mindestens genauso entscheidend für den Erfolg im Digital-Business? Die richtige Performance und Sicherheit Eurer Webseite. Das zeigt extrem anschaulich das Beispiel des Uhren-Marktplatzes Chrono24: "Performance ist für uns ein relevanter Treiber für die User Experience auf der Plattform und gerade in unserer Domäne spielt Sicherheit eine entscheidende Rolle für das Vertrauen der Nutzer in unsere Plattform“, sagt Sven Ferber, Director Technology bei Chrono24. 

Wir besprechen beim nächsten OMR Virtual Panel deswegen direkt mit Sven Ferber und Marc Lamik, Director of Product bei Cloudflare, wie die richtige Technologie-Infrastruktur am Ende über Erfolg und Misserfolg ganzer Geschäftsmodelle bestimmt. Und wie es Chrono24 durch das Drehen an den richtigen Stellschrauben geschafft hat, jeden Monat neun Millionen Unique Visitors mit Seiten-Performance und -Sicherheit zu überzeugen. Hier nochmal die Übersicht der Speaker, die in 45 Minuten ihre Erfahrungen teilen:

Sven Ferber – Director Technology, Chrono24

 

Marc Lamik – Director of Product, Cloudflare

 

Martin Gardt – Senior Editor, OMR

nodes.title: DDoS Trends and Mitigation Strategies: What's best for your network?
nodes.description:
The global pandemic changed the way we work, travel, play, and stay connected — increasing our reliance on the Internet, more than ever. As more of our activities shifted online, so did the number of cyber threats we observed over the Internet.

DDoS attacks, specifically, dominated the charts in terms of frequency, sophistication, and geo-distribution in the last year. 

IT network and security decision-makers face several options when it comes to DDoS mitigation deployment, such as on-premise hardware versus cloud-based scrubbing centers as well as always-on versus on-demand deployment models.

Join this webinar to learn about various deployment models, with a focus on comparing always-on and on-demand protection, challenges associated with traditional architectures, and key factors to consider before choosing a deployment model.

In this webinar, you will learn about:

  • Latest DDoS trends
  • Key DDoS mitigation strategies
  • Steps organizations can take to make the impact of DDoS attacks a thing of the past

nodes.title: Power Hour: Redefining The Corporate Network
nodes.description:
The building blocks of traditional WAN architectures are showing their age. MPLS is expensive and has painfully slow deployment times. Broadband Internet does not deliver the millisecond performance and constant reliability needed for most business applications today. And neither infrastructure was designed with security in mind. Compounding matters further, the surge in remote work and increased cloud adoption is straining traditional WAN architectures. Band-aid solutions like VPN boxes don’t solve the core problems with enterprise network architecture.

In this session, we will explore:

  • Replacing MPLS between branch offices & data centers
  • Securing remote employee access to private networks — without VPNs
  • Strengthening your security posture — while retiring legacy hardware
  • Delivering DDoS protection, traffic acceleration, and much more from every Cloudflare data center— for on-premise, cloud-hosted, and hybrid networks

nodes.title: Bot Management: Better Understand and Combat Bots with Bot Analytics
nodes.description:
Bad bots impact most online businesses. These bad bots interface with applications just like a real user would, making them harder to detect. Businesses need real-time visibility into bot traffic to block bad bots.

Cloudflare recently launched a Bot Analytics feature that provides real-time visibility into bot traffic and trends. Bot Analytics provides a breakdown of traffic distribution and easy filtering on multiple dimensions of data, directly within the Cloudflare dashboard.

Join this webinar for insights on using Bot Analytics to effectively visualize bot traffic and create policies to block bad bots.

nodes.title: Cloudflare for Teams - What's Next for Zero Trust?
nodes.description:
Now more than ever, organizations need to evaluate and modernize their approach to network and application security - with so many employees using unmanaged devices and connecting over unsecured networks, severe security gaps and productivity chokepoints have become commonplace. Cloudflare for Teams combines ZTNA, Secure Web Gateway, CASB, and Remote Browser Isolation into a complete, singular enterprise-grade solution - In a single-pass architecture, employee traffic is verified, filtered, inspected and isolated from Internet threats; and performance never suffers, as users connect through data centers near them in 200+ cities and 100 countries around the world. 

Come see the live end user experience and walkthroughs of use cases like:

  • Endpoint security posture enforcement 
  • Identity-based Zero Trust access rules
  • Protection from zero-day threats with Browser Isolation

nodes.title: Cambodia Webinar: Ransom DDOs & How You Can Prevent and Respond
nodes.description:
As Internet usage increases, Cloudflare also sees an uptick in the number and the types of cyberattacks. DDoS activity continues day and night roaming from one victim to another. Automated scanning tools look for vulnerabilities in literally anything connected to the Internet. And attacks don’t only grow, they change. New techniques are invented- one of them is Ransom DDOS.

Softline and Cloudflare invite you to register for this session and:

1. Find out how Cambodia ranks in DDOS attacks distribution globally

2. See real-time internet trends and insights in Cambodia

3. Find out what is RDDoS and explore how you can respond and prevent these attacks from happening

Stay on for a supercharged Q&A session and test your cybersecurity readiness! Ten (10) surprise gifts will be up for grabs!

nodes.title: Cloudflare Connect: VPN/ZTNA as a service
nodes.description: This session will discuss the challenges of connecting employees via traditional VPNs in all-remote and hybrid-remote working models, and why VPN as-a-service provides a better solution.

nodes.description: Distributed workforces require distributed networks. In the arms race to SASE, the strength of the network will matter more than the set of security controls. nodes.title: Scaling the security and performance of your games
nodes.description:
Most gaming companies aspire to have thousands of users playing their game simultaneously. However, supporting this many players at once can create technical strain, especially because latency hurts player performance and experience.

Register for this live webinar with Cloudflare security and performance experts David Lallement and Yarik Chervonyy, Customer Development (EMEA Gaming Sector) and Matthew Scicluna, Director of TechOps (Novibet) to hear: 

  • How to protect the players and performance of your games in times of explosive growth
  • How to upgrade your current on-premise or cloud infrastructure to adapt to a global audience
  • A conversation with Matthew Scicluna, Director of Technical Operations at Novibet, on using Cloudflare to scale their operations

nodes.title: Power Hour: Zero Trust for everyone: 3 ways to get there fast
nodes.description:
The COVID-19 pandemic has exposed the weaknesses of the traditional ‘castle-and-moat’ security model. Remote work has expanded attack surfaces infinitely outwards, and more than ever, organizations need to start from the assumption that their ‘castle’ is already compromised. Zero Trust has emerged as a compelling security framework to address the failures of existing perimeter-based security approaches.

At Cloudflare, we’re making complicated security challenges easier to solve and we’ve helped thousands of organizations- both big and small- take their first steps toward Zero Trust.

In this webinar, explore what the most successful organizations do first on their journey to Zero Trust.

We’ll cover:

  • The Zero Trust framework, and our recommended ZTNA security model
  • How organizations of differing size and security maturity have implemented Zero Trust 
  • Enhancements and product updates
  • Cloudflare’s Zero Trust implementation and lessons learned

nodes.title: Web Security: Protecting Your Data from Internet Threats
nodes.description:
Join this on-demand webinar to learn about how one of the most accessible methods of cracking your corporate data is through a simple Internet connection. In this webinar, experts offer a look at some of the most common ways that cyber attackers use to crack enterprise systems via the Web, and what you can do to improve your own organization’s Web security–not only at the server level, but across your Web-connected systems and applications. 

In this webinar, you will learn:

  • Learn to defend an expanding attack surface full of remote network devices
  • Get up to date on emerging attacks on cloud services
  • Learn about the latest DDoS mitigation tools and strategies

nodes.description:
Die Anzahl an Angriffsflächen im Unternehmen steigt permanent – vor allem durch die Zunahme von Remote-Arbeit aufgrund der Notlage in Österreich. Allein im letzten Jahr hat das Volumen an abgewehrten Cyber-Attacken extrem zugenommen. Mitarbeiter sind angreifbarer als jemals zuvor; darum können sich Unternehmen nicht länger auf bisherige Sicherheitsansätze verlassen.

SASE hat sich als ein überzeugendes Framework etabliert, das die Mängel der perimeterbasierten
Sicherheit behebt und längerfristige geschäftliche Agilität ermöglicht. Das Modell stellt ein ehrgeiziges, aber nicht unerreichbares Ziel dar.

Unsere Zero Trust Experten werden ihre Sichtweise darüber teilen, wie Organisationen in Österreich mit unterschiedlichen IT- Stacks und unterschiedlichem Infosec-Reifegrad mit der Implementierung eines SASE beginnen
können und diskutieren, wie Organisationen ihre IT-Architektur modernisieren können und sollten.

nodes.title: Nepal DDOS Attack Trends & How You Should Respond
nodes.description:
The global pandemic is forcing global business leaders to rapidly pivot to remote work styles and to ensure their infrastructure is able to handle the resulting massive surge in Internet activity. CIOs, CISO, and CSOs are being challenged now more than ever to demonstrate efficiency and agility to drive positive business outcomes in the face of increasing uncertainty.

Join this webinar and find out more about:

1. DDOS attack trends and what it can cost you (legitimate/ not legitimate traffic)

2. The key essentials for ensuring business and IT continuity & security

3. How Cloudflare Magic Transit and DNS together monitor and mitigate DDoS attacks of all sizes and kinds

              Stay on for a supercharged Q&A session to win a prize! Three (3) surprise gifts will be up for grabs!

nodes.title: Can the impact of DDoS attacks be a thing of the past?
nodes.description:
2020 was an unprecedented year. The pandemic changed the way we work, travel, play, and stay connected—increasing our reliance on the internet more than ever. But as our digital activities have increased, so have the number of cyber threats. DDoS attacks, specifically, rose in terms of frequency, sophistication, and geo-distribution. nodes.title: Why You Need to Take a Holistic Approach to Web-Protection
nodes.description:
Join this on-demand webinar with Frost & Sullivan's analyst, Mikita Hanets and Cloudflare, recently named the Innovation Leader in the Frost & Sullivan Frost Radar™: Global Holistic Web Protection Market Report.

Why watch this on-demand webinar? We will show you how historically siloed web-protection products, now need to complement each other and be a seamless, holistic approach to web-protection.  Enterprises across the world are looking for ways to strengthen their security posture with state-of-the-art products and services.

In this webinar, you will learn:

  • The current state of the web protection landscape - the roles of WAF, DDoS, Bot management
  • How the threat landscape is changing and its impact on web protection approaches
  • Which types of companies in NAMER are highly targeted and why
  • Why defending against modern adversaries and attacks needs to take a holistic approach

nodes.title: Xu hướng tấn công DDoS và cách phòng thủ cho doanh nghiệp Việt
nodes.description:
Webinar Language: Vietnamese

Đại dịch toàn cầu đã khiến các doanh nghiệp buộc phải thay đổi sang cách thức làm việc mới  - Remote Work. Các phần mềm làm việc trực tuyến được tìm kiếm và download rầm rộ. Nhiều đơn vị buộc phải mở hệ thống ra internet để nhân viên có thể truy cập và làm việc từ xa… Điều này tạo môi trường cho kẻ xấu khai thác lỗ hổng, tấn công, đánh cắp thông tin.

Mục tiêu của một cuộc tấn công mạng rất đa dạng, có thể là vi phạm dữ liệu (đánh cắp, thay đổi, mã hóa, phá hủy), cũng có thể nhắm tới sự toàn vẹn của hệ thống (gây gián đoạn, cản trở dịch vụ), hoặc lợi dụng tài nguyên của nạn nhân (hiển thị quảng cáo, mã độc đào tiền ảo) và phần lớn nhắm vào doanh nghiệp. 

Vậy làm cách nào để không trở thành nạn nhân của những đợt tấn công mạng?

Softline và Cloudflare hân hạnh tổ chức hội thảo với chủ đề “Xu hướng tấn công DDos và cách phòng phủ cho doanh nghiệp Việt” nhằm giúp doanh nghiệp:

  1. Cập nhật tình hình tấn công mạng tại Việt Nam
  2. Cập nhật xu hướng tấn công DDoS mới nhất tại Việt Nam
  3. Nắm bắt thủ thuật của các cuộc tấn công mạng để phòng tránh hiệu quả

Ngoài ra, hội thảo cũng là cơ hội để doanh nghiệp tìm hiểu sâu hơn về biện pháp bảo mật an ninh mạng thông qua phần hỏi đáp với các chuyên gia đến từ Softline và Cloudflare.

(*) Đăng ký ngay để nhận liên kết tham dự hội thảo qua email. 

Softline và Cloudflare hân hạnh đón tiếp Quý doanh nghiệp tại hội thảo.

nodes.title: Beyond the Perimeter: Securing Fragmented Environments with Zero Trust
nodes.description:
Enterprises today are choosing to adopt remote working models for the long-term. While workforces are coping well, with studies showing that remote workers are 35-40% more productive than their in-office counterparts, there remain significant concerns when it comes to security.

Today, remote workers are using disparate technologies and are accessing corporate systems through home and public networks. That’s why organisations, especially those in critical sectors such as finance, education and government, need to adopt a Zero Trust approach and treat networks and devices as untrusted until proven otherwise.

This webinar delves into how implementing a Zero Trust framework can bolster network security strategies and enable cyber resilience.


Discussion points:

  • How the move to remote/hybrid working models is impacting enterprise networks
  • Understanding Zero Trust
  • Communicating network security risks, and the rewards of Zero Trust
  • How to monitor and maintain a Zero Trust environment
  • What’s next for the network?

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

Finally, we will outline the best practices for leveraging your Cloudflare Support resources.

Наши технические эксперты расскажут вам о возможностях Cloudflare в направлении SASE (технология безопасного пограничного доступа) с проведением демонстрации и поделятся опытом внедрения решения.

Вебинар покроет следующие темы:

  • Zero Trust технология от Cloudflare

nodes.title: Zero Trust for a Work-From-Home World
nodes.description:
When organizations abruptly sent vast numbers of employees home, their carefully planned security architectures were forced to adapt to new challenges. But the makeshift WFH security architectures thrown together with duct tape and rubber bands in spring 2020 are not strong enough to handle the needs of an enterprise with a permanently remote workforce. Precious corporate endpoint devices sent to unfamiliar locations, connecting to routers that use default passwords, and sharing space with unsecured IoT devices...is a zero-trust security architecture even possible in a situation like this? In this Dark Reading webinar, learn how to make layered, zero-trust architecture work among today's business realities (and tomorrow's).

When you attend this webinar, you will:

  • Learn how attackers are increasingly targeting weaknesses in businesses' remote access controls -- and how to strengthen those weak spots
  • Discover effective methods for protecting corporate endpoints from the unfamiliar, unsecured devices they're sharing ""home office"" space with
  • Learn about tools and techniques for keeping ever-essential web services secure and available

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: [German Webinar] SASE - Die Transformation vom zentralisierten Rechenzentrum zum Service beim Nutzer
nodes.description:
SASE - Die Transformation vom zentralisierten Rechenzentrum zum Service beim Nutzer

Wie Unternehmen diesen innovativen Ansatz implementieren können

Die Anzahl an Angriffsflächen im Unternehmen steigt permanent – vor allem durch die Zunahme von Home-Office aufgrund der globalen Notlage. Die Angriffsmethoden haben sich weiterentwickelt, wobei protokollbasierte Angriffe im vergangenen Jahr um das 3 bis 10-fache zugenommen haben. Netzwerk-Grenzen verschwimmen und Mitarbeiter sind angreifbarer als jemals zuvor; darum können sich Unternehmen nicht mehr länger auf bisherige Sicherheitsansätze verlassen.

SASE (Secure Access Service Edge) konsolidiert Netzwerkdienste und Netzwerksicherheitsservices und verteilt sie von einer einzigen, cloudbasierten Plattform aus. Auf diese Weise eliminiert SASE Sicherheitslücken zwischen den Diensten, gibt IT-Teams einen besseren Einblick in die Netzwerkaktivitäten und vereinfacht den Cloud-Migrationsprozess.

Die Referenten werden ihre Sichtweise darüber teilen, wie Organisationen mit unterschiedlichen IT-Stacks und unterschiedlichem Infosec-Reifegraden mit der Implementierung eines SASE beginnen können und diskutieren, wie Organisationen ihre IT-Architektur modernisieren können und sollten.

nodes.title: [Computerwoche Webcast] Warum Sie jetzt auf Zero Trust setzen sollten
nodes.description:
Was haben Cloud, E-Commerce, Edge Computing und mobiles Arbeiten gemeinsam? Sie alle vergrößern die Angriffsfläche für Cyberkriminelle massiv und durchlöchern den Perimeter-Schutz.

Unternehmen benötigen daher eine Security-Strategie, die Anwender, Endpunkte, Daten und IT-Ressourcen umfassend absichert – egal wo sich diese befinden, und ohne Produktivität und Nutzerzufriedenheit zu beeinträchtigen.

Wie Sie mit dem Security-Framework Zero Trust dieses Ziel erreichen können, das erfahren Sie in unserem Webcast.

Rebecca Roche von Cloudflare zeigt Ihnen …

  • was Zero Trust in der Praxis bedeutet und wie Sie das Frameworkam besten umsetzen,
  • wie andere Firmen unterschiedlicher Größe und Sicherheitsreife vonZero Trust profitiert haben.
  • welche Erfahrungen Cloudflare selbst bei der Implementierung vonZero Trust gemacht hat, und was Sie daraus lernen können.

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: India/EMEA Cybersecurity and DDoS attack trends to watch out for in 2021
nodes.description:
According to Wipro’s latest State of Cybersecurity Report, 45% of organizations experienced DDoS attacks. Attackers have continuously outsmarted traditional defenses by novel attack techniques. As cybersecurity threats continue to evolve in frequency and sophistication, the key is to understand what approaches attackers are currently using to stay ahead of the curve, and how futuristic organizations are reacting to it.

In this webinar, learn in detail key DDoS response and mitigation strategies from the findings of Wipro’s State of Cybersecurity Report and the latest DDoS attack trends identified by Cloudflare. 

Key takeaways:
·         Analysis of worldwide DDoS attack patterns
·         Network-layer DDoS attack trends
·         Best practices for maintaining cyber hygiene
·         Wipro’s Cybersecurity Predictions for 2021

nodes.title: 1日で導入を実現するゼロトラストへの第一歩！ ～Cloudflare Teams(Access)の紹介～
nodes.description:
急激なリモートワークへの移行により、セキュリティ対策強化としてゼロトラスト化をご検討されているお客様が多いのではないでしょうか？

このウェビナーでは自宅や社外のインターネット環境から社内システムへのアクセスにセキュリティ課題を持たれている方向けへの解決策として、ゼロトラストセキュリティへの第一歩となる一日で導入可能なリモートアクセスを実現する：Cloudflare Teamsの紹介と実際の導入について分かりやすく解説いたします。

ご興味ございましたら、ぜひウェビナーにご参加ください。

登録して参加し、20米ドル相当のオンラインショッピングバウチャーを受け取る最初の30人の1人になりましょう！*利用規約が適用されます

今すぐ登録

セミナープログラム

*利用規約

1. 各セッション全体を登録して参加した最初の30人には、20米ドル相当の無料のオンラインショッピングバウチャーが提供されます。
2. バウチャーは日本を拠点とする参加者にのみ提供されます。
3. 有効なビジネス用メールアドレスを提供した参加者のみがバウチャーの対象となります。パブリックメールドメイン（gmail、outlook、aol、yahooメール、mail.com、icloudメールを含むがこれらに限定されない）からのメールアドレスは受け入れられず、登録は無効と見なされます。 CloudflareとClaraの競合企業である企業を代表する登録リクエストとウェビナー参加者は受け付けられません。
 4. バウチャーは、ウェビナーセッション後24時間以内に、対象となる最初の30人の参加者に電子メールで配信されます。登録プロセス中に電子メールを含む個人情報を正確に入力することは、参加者の単独の責任です。

nodes.title: [Exclusive Romanian Webinar] Modernise your network and security stack: Protect your remote workforce, on-premise and cloud infrastructure
nodes.description:
Attack surfaces are expanding infinitely outwards, particularly with the rise of remote work through the global pandemic. With employees and infrastructure more vulnerable than ever, organizations can no longer rely on legacy ‘castle-and-moat’ security approaches. 

In response to Romania's position as the host of the new EU Cybersecurity Centre, we invite you to discover innovative solutions to securing your on-premise and cloud infrastructure, remote employees and their devices, as well as the internal SaaS and self-hosted applications your business depend on. Doing this all in a performant manner with a cloud network you can rely on. 

You will also leave with a better sense for how to embrace Zero Trust and SASE principles in your organizations based, in part, on Cloudflare’s own experiences and customer engagements.

nodes.title: How to future-proof your cybersecurity protection
nodes.description:
The global pandemic has caught many businesses off guard. Users, data, devices, critical business applications, and networks have left the office and became more distributed. 

This shift in the way we work & do business has resulted in companies losing visibility into what was happening in their corporate and their employees’ personal networks, devices, and applications. This shift has also seen a number of cybercriminals and sophisticated hacking groups rapidly adjusting their techniques and tactics to take advantage of the situation. 

Whether you’re a Fortune 500 company or a small/medium enterprise, there are fundamentally key things you need to protect: data, devices, applications, and the network itself.

NxtGen and Cloudflare invite you to join this session and:

  1. Find out how India ranks in DDOS attacks distribution globally
  2. See real-time internet trends and insights in India
  3. Stay ahead of the cyberattack vectors & future- proof your cybersecurity protection regardless of the shift in the workforce situation

Stay on for a supercharged Q&A session and test your cybersecurity readiness! Three (3) surprise gifts will be up for grabs!

nodes.title: Ensuring Zero Trade-off Between Security and Customer Experience
nodes.description:
Maintaining the right balance between security and customer experience is always challenging for online businesses. This challenge becomes even more relevant during this crisis as businesses face unprecedented levels of traffic and attacks.

Tune in to learn how LendingTree leverages Cloudflare to strengthen their security posture while ensuring a superior online experience for their customers. Listen to security experts from LendingTree and Cloudflare as they discuss:

  • Emerging attack vectors and tactics impacting online platforms
  • Best practices for online businesses to overcome these threats
  • How LendingTree leverages Cloudflare to maintain the right balance between security and business objectives

About LendingTree
LendingTree is the largest online lending marketplace for various financial borrowing needs including auto loans, small business loans, personal loans, credit cards, and more.

nodes.title: Como ter sucesso com o Serviço de Acesso Seguro de Borda (SASE)
nodes.description:
Com o surgimento do Serviço de Acesso Seguro de Borda (SASE), os profissionais de rede e de segurança estão trabalhando  para criar um plano de migração para essa nova plataforma que se adapta melhor à natureza distribuída dos usuários e dados. o SASE promete reduzir a complexidade e os custos, aprimorar o desempenho, aumentar a acessibilidade e reforçar a segurança. Mas você pode estar se perguntando: o que preciso fazer para obter essas vantagens à medida que me preparo para implementar uma arquitetura de SASE?
 
Inscreva-se agora para aprender:
  • Por que o SASE precisa ser menos complicado do que muitos fornecedores o fazem parecer
  • Quais fatores devem ser analisados ao se avaliar a migração para uma plataforma de SASE
  • Um roteiro de implementação com 3, 6 e 12 meses de duração
  • Como a Cloudflare One, uma plataforma desenvolvida especificamente para SASE, cumpre o que promete e proporciona as vantagens abaixo

nodes.title: 中国区星期二技术更新
nodes.description:
感谢您对Cloudflare合作伙伴计划的关注！

当您继续响应数字化转型的呼吁，并在本地，公共云，混合云和SaaS应用程序中满足全球性能，可靠性和安全性需求时，我们Cloudflare始终如一地致力于使您成功并与我们一起成长，并为您提供各种工具和资源，唾手可得！

加入星期二技术更新系列！这30分钟的虚拟学习课程由Cloudflare专家提供，内​​容简单易懂，更适合您的快节奏工作环境，同时帮助您浏览我们专注于3个关键领域的Cloudflare解决方案：

1.Cloudflare产品集和发展路线
2.它是为谁和怎样而实现的
3.强大的好处和不同

2021年3月9日，星期二，星期二业界领先的DDOS保护
DDoS攻击正在激增，无论是频率还是复杂程度。了解中国如何在全球DDOS攻击分布中排名，找出政府在网络安全方面的职责，并与Cloudflare一起，以快速，智能，全面的防御复杂攻击的方式帮助企业保持在线。

nodes.title: SASE: La nueva era en seguridad IT
nodes.description:
Si bien está en el ciclo del hype de Gartner, SASE (Secure Access Service Edge) seguirá ganando adeptos a medida que las organizaciones dejan atrás las medidas de respuesta rápida que tuvieron que implementar por el aumento masivo e inesperado de trabajadores remotos.

Pronunciado “sassy” y entregado principalmente como un servicio basado en la nube, SASE es una arquitectura de red que combina capacidades WAN definidas por software y servicios de seguridad de red nativos de la nube, incluido acceso Zero Trust, gateways web seguros, agentes de seguridad de acceso a la nube y firewalls como servicio. Sus promesas de aumento del desempeño y disminución de costos resultan también un gran atractivo.

En esta sesión interactiva se explica cómo obtener beneficios mientras se está implementando una arquitectura SASE

Conozca:

  • Porqué SASE es menos complicado de lo que parece a simple vista
  • Criterios de evaluación para migrar a una plataforma SASE
  • El roadmap a tres, seis y 12 meses para la implementación
  • Cloudflare One, una plataforma diseñada para SASE, y todas sus virtudes

nodes.title: Overcoming the Top 3 challenges of a multi-cloud environment
nodes.description:
Webinar Language: Cantonese

As enterprises continue to respond to the call for digital transformation, the Multi-cloud strategy continues to appeal to many organizations. Enterprises recognize that by placing workloads across multiple cloud environments, they can optimize spend and minimize financial risk through increased ROI. It also enables them to deliver tailored cloud services that meet specific business needs on a case-by-case basis.

While exploring this model creates incredible flexibility, it also has the potential to inject greater networking and security complexity. It can mean less control and more risks which are highly disastrous for organizations like yours.

Cloudflare and Rackspace Technology invite you to join this webinar as we discuss:
1. The Top 3 challenges of a multi-cloud environment
2. Up to date Internet trends and insights in Hong Kong
3. Comprehensive solutions and services at your fingertips to support your multi-cloud journey

nodes.title: DDoS攻撃のトレンドとCloudflareでの対策
nodes.description:
Cloudflareパートナープログラムに関心をお寄せいただき、ありがとうございます。

皆様がデジタルトランスフォーメーションを推進し、オンプレミスやパブリッククラウド、ハイブリッド、SaaSアプリケーションに対して、パフォーマンス、信頼性、セキュリティのニーズを提供する際に、Cloudflareは皆様に最適のツールとリソースをご提供してまいります！

 

火曜日のTechUpdatesシリーズにぜひ、ご参加ください！これらのバーチャルトレーニングセッションは、Cloudflareの専門家によって、素早い対応が必要な作業環境により適した、分かりやすいコンパクトなコンテンツで提供され、3つの主要分野に焦点を当ててCloudflareソリューションへのナビゲートを支援します。


1.製品ポートフォリオとロードマップ
2.機能概要について
3.ベネフィットと差別化要因


2021年3月2日火曜日　業界をリードするDDOS保護
DDoS攻撃は、頻度と高度さの両方で急増しています。日本がDDOS攻撃の世界的な分布でどのようにランク付けされているかを確認し、サイバーセキュリティに関する政府の方針を確認し、高度なDDos攻撃に対してクラウドフレアのDDosプロテクションがどのように企業のオンライン環境を維持できるようにするかにつき、解説いたします。

1.セッションは日本時間の午後3時から4時までとなります。

2.Cloudflareは、パートナー様にこれらのセッションへ皆様の見込み客または顧客を招待することをお勧めします。*各セッションに登録して全体を通して参加した最初の50人には、20米ドルの電子クーポンが提供されます。規約が適用されます

3. Q&Aセッションにご参加いただいた場合にウルトラミニポータブルプロジェクターを獲得するチャンスがございます。

nodes.title: APAC Cybersecurity and DDoS attack trends to watch out for in 2021
nodes.description:
According to Wipro’s latest State of Cybersecurity Report, 45% of organizations experienced DDoS attacks. Attackers have continuously outsmarted traditional defenses by novel attack techniques. As cybersecurity threats continue to evolve in frequency and sophistication, the key is to understand what approaches attackers are currently using to stay ahead of the curve, and how futuristic organizations are reacting to it.

In this webinar, learn in detail key DDoS response and mitigation strategies from the findings of Wipro’s State of Cybersecurity Report and the latest DDoS attack trends identified by Cloudflare. 

Key takeaways:
·         Analysis of worldwide DDoS attack patterns
·         Network-layer DDoS attack trends
·         Best practices for maintaining cyber hygiene
·         Wipro’s Cybersecurity Predictions for 2021

nodes.title: Cloudflare Product Chats: What's New for Cloudflare One? (Mandarin)
nodes.description:
AMER: Wednesday, February 24 @ 6:00 PM PST // Cloudflare is always innovating to bring our customers new products and features. Join Cloudflare's Product Managers each month to hear the latest highlights, including February's feature on Cloudflare One. 

Note: This session will be in Mandarin.

nodes.title: Latest DDoS Trends and the Evolving Threat Landscape
nodes.description:
2020 was an unprecedented year — not just due to the pandemic and the world affairs, but also in terms of the frequency, sophistication, and distribution of cyber attacks. For example, in Q4 2020 alone, Cloudflare recorded a nearly 10x increase in protocol based attacks compared to the prior quarter.

Learn about the evolving DDoS threat landscape from Cloudflare’s vantage point, as the product team shares Q4'2020 DDoS trends and observations. 

Vivek Ganti, Product Marketing Manager at Cloudflare will showcase how Cloudflare is uniquely positioned to help protect you from DDoS attacks and cyber threats, helping businesses to manage the implications of the current crisis on their infrastructure.

 

Join this webinar to:

  • Review the DDoS Trends Report with Product Expert, Vivek Ganti
  • Gather insights from the latest DDoS Trends Report
  • Learn how you can protect your network against threats without compromising on performance

nodes.title: Cloudflare Product Chats: What's New for Cloudflare One? (EMEA/AMER)
nodes.description: AMER: Thursday, February 18 @ 8:00 AM PST // Cloudflare is always innovating to bring our customers new products and features. Join Cloudflare's Product Managers each month to hear the latest highlights, including February's feature on Cloudflare One.

nodes.description:
2020 was an unprecedented year — not just due to the pandemic and the world affairs, but also in terms of the frequency, sophistication, and distribution of cyber attacks. For example, in Q4 2020 alone, Cloudflare recorded a nearly 10x increase in protocol based attacks compared to the prior quarter.

Learn about the evolving DDoS threat landscape from Cloudflare’s vantage point, as the product team shares Q4'2020 DDoS trends and observations. 

Xin Meng, Solutions Engineer at Cloudflare will showcase how Cloudflare is uniquely positioned to help protect you from DDoS attacks and cyber threats, helping businesses to manage the implications of the current crisis on their infrastructure.

Join this webinar to:

  • Review the DDoS Trends Report with Product Expert, Xin Meng
  • Gather insights from the latest DDoS Trends Report
  • Learn how you can protect your network against threats without compromising on performance

nodes.title: Cloudflare Product Chats: What's New for Cloudflare One? (APAC/AMER)
nodes.description: AMER: Wednesday, February 17 @ 5:00 PM PST // Cloudflare is always innovating to bring our customers new products and features. Join Cloudflare's Product Managers each month to hear the latest highlights, including February's feature on Cloudflare One.

nodes.title: Data Privacy, Data Residency and the Modern Data Network
nodes.description:
Join us for a webinar with Cloudflare, the security, performance, and reliability company, and OneTrust, the largest and most widely used privacy, security, and data governance technology platform.

Our speakers John Graham-Cumming, CTO of Cloudflare, and Blake Brannon, CTO of OneTrust, will discuss the current state of data privacy, data residency considerations, and how OneTrust leverages Cloudflare’s widely distributed global cloud platform to bring to market innovative privacy-focused solutions.

nodes.title: Bot Management: Better Understand and Combat Bots with Bot Analytics
nodes.description:
Bad bots impact most online businesses. These bad bots interface with applications just like a real user would, making them harder to detect. Businesses need real-time visibility into bot traffic to block bad bots.

Cloudflare recently launched a Bot Analytics feature that provides real-time visibility into bot traffic and trends. Bot Analytics provides a breakdown of traffic distribution and easy filtering on multiple dimensions of data, directly within the Cloudflare dashboard.

Join this webinar for insights on using Bot Analytics to effectively visualize bot traffic and create policies to block bad bots.

nodes.title: How to Plan for Bot Attacks in 2021
nodes.description:
In 2020, as businesses moved the majority of their activities to the digital world, bots saw this as an opportunity to target businesses that were vulnerable. Cloudflare expects that the bot attack trend would continue in 2021. Bots have become sophisticated and traditional approaches such as rate-limiting, WAF, or homegrown solutions are no longer effective.

Register now, and you’ll learn:

  • 2020 Bot Attack Trends
  • Bot Impacts and Attack Signs on Business
  • How Cloudflare Bot Management can help to prepare for bot attacks in 2021

nodes.title: Hội thảo dành cho Đối tác của Cloudflare và khách hàng- 2 series
nodes.description:
Cloudflare xin trân trọng kính mời quý Đối tác và khách hàng tham dự vào 2 buổi hội thảo training bằng tiếng Việt dành riêng cho quý Đối tác và khách hàng theo nội dung bên dưới:


Hội thảo buổi 1: Ngày 27 tháng 1 năm 2021, 3-4PM Giờ Việt Nam

Hội thảo buổi 2: Ngày 28 tháng 1 năm 2021, 3-4PM Giờ Việt Nam

nodes.title: Succeeding With Secure Access Service Edge (SASE)
nodes.description:
With the emergence of the Secure Access Service Edge (SASE), network and security professionals are struggling to build a migration plan for this new platform that adapts to the distributed nature of users and data. SASE promises to reduce complexity and cost, improve performance, increase accessibility and enhance security. The question is: How do you gain these benefits as you work towards implementing a SASE architecture?

Register now, and you’ll learn:

  • Why SASE should be less complicated than many vendors are making it
  • What to look for when evaluating a migration to a SASE platform
  • A 3 month, 6 month, and 12 month roadmap for implementation
  • How Cloudflare One, a purpose-built SASE platform, delivers on these promised benefits

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: Why Zero Trust Architecture Will Become the New Normal in 2021
nodes.description:
The COVID-19 pandemic brought changes no IT team was ready for: employees were sent home, customer interaction models changed, and cloud transformation efforts abruptly accelerated. Cloudflare recently commissioned Forrester Consulting to explore the impact of 2020 disruptions on security strategy and operations among companies of all sizes. To do so, they surveyed 317 global security decision makers from around the world.

Join our guest Forrester VP, Principal Analyst, Chase Cunningham, and Cloudflare Go-To-Market Leader, Brian Parks, for an in-depth discussion of the survey results, followed by practical guidance for next year’s planning.

  • How 2020’s disruptions created challenges and opportunities for security teams of all sizes
  • Specific challenges North American companies faced in securing the change
  • Why executive buy-in for Zero Trust security initiatives is higher than ever
  • What peer security leaders are prioritizing for Zero Trust initiatives in 2021
  • How to drive successful Zero Trust pilot projects with Cloudflare for Teams

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: Getting engineering and security teams building together
nodes.description:
At Cloudflare, we build trust and security into every product we introduce. To make that happen, we build close partnerships between engineering and security teams. It requires our security team to think like engineers, and to actively build/test products alongside them. During this webinar, Evan Johnson, product security leader at Cloudflare, will share how Cloudflare has set up our security and engineering teams for fast and effective collaboration, and how we put that collaboration to work in the creation of our own Team security product.

You'll learn:

  • How Cloudflare's internal security team thinks about identity and access management - and how we've made it better over time
  • Ways to get security and engineering teams building together in a world where "every company is a tech company"
  • A case study on how engineering and security worked together to build and tested our Zero Trust security product

nodes.title: How Cloudflare Customers use Bot Management to help during Peak Events
nodes.description: Bots are becoming more sophisticated. For those who rely on Black Friday and other peak events, you can't risk a large bot attack. In this webinar, Sumit and Ben will review different ways our Bot Management solution can help with and even prevent bot attacks during high traffic times.

nodes.title: Cloudflare Product Chats: What's New for Cloudflare Network & Analytics (Mandarin)
nodes.description: Cloudflare is always innovating to bring our customers new products and features. Join Cloudflare experts each month to hear the latest highlights, including December’s feature on Cloudflare Network and Analytics.

nodes.title: Why Zero Trust architecture will become the new normal in 2021: Asia Pacific Point of View
nodes.description:
The COVID-19 pandemic brought changes no IT team was ready for: employees were sent home, customer interaction models changed, and cloud transformation efforts abruptly accelerated. Cloudflare recently commissioned Forrester Consulting to explore the impact of 2020 disruptions on security strategy and operations among companies of all sizes. To do so, they surveyed 317 global security decision makers from around the world.

Join our guest Forrester Senior Analyst, David Holmes, and Cloudflare Product Marketing Lead, Lane Billings, for an in-depth discussion of the survey results, followed by practical guidance for next year's planning.

Register now, and you'll learn:

  • How 2020's disruptions created challenges and opportunities for APAC-based organizations
  • Why executive buy-in for Zero Trust security initiatives is now higher than ever
  • What other APAC security leaders are prioritizing for Zero Trust initiatives in 2021
  • How to drive successful Zero Trust pilot projects with Cloudflare for Teams

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: Building Resilient Applications with Cloudflare DNS
nodes.description:
DNS is a mission-critical component for any online business. Yet this component is often overlooked and forgotten until something breaks.

As DNS attacks become more prevalent, businesses are starting to realize that the lack of a resilient DNS creates a weak link in their security strategy. Also, adopting the right DNS posture is important for achieving 100% uptime and ensuring uninterrupted superior performance. This becomes even more important during this crisis environment as your online presence is the only bridge connecting your business to customers and prospects.

Join this webinar to learn more about:

  • Risks posed by a weak DNS strategy,
  • Different ways to accomplish a redundant DNS setup,
  • How Cloudflare makes it easy to deploy a secure and resilient DNS.

nodes.title: Scaling service provider business with DDoS-mitigation-as-a-service
nodes.description:
Service providers are regular targets of DDoS attacks—either directly on their network infrastructure or indirectly via attacks on their customer networks. Regardless, any attack on service providers has a direct impact on their uptime, availability, and therefore, revenue.

Hardware DDoS appliances and cloud-based ‘scrubbing centers’ have their own limitations in terms of costs, capacity, and performance—all key considerations for service providers. Service providers need a way to offer a scalable, robust (and profitable) DDoS mitigation service to their customers that helps them secure their networks and grow their revenue.

Join this webinar to learn more:

  • Why hardware appliance-based DDoS mitigation won’t work anymore
  • How to increase revenue while offering best-in-class DDoS mitigation
  • How to get deeper insights into attacks on your network

nodes.title: Network Transformation: How to Stay Secure and Reduce Cost When Migrating to the Cloud
nodes.description:
Network Transformation—the process of moving networking functions into the cloud—is an important and often-overlooked element of an organization’s overall cloud migration journey. It gives IT teams greater agility, and solves many of the security and performance issues that stem from hybrid, heterogeneous network infrastructure.

What does this transformation look like in practice? What challenges can impede it? And what benefits can it provide?

Register for this webinar to learn:

  • How ‘network transformation’ can provide improved security, performance, and reliability of on-premise, hybrid, and multi-cloud infrastructure
  • Case studies of how several companies approached network transformation and what they learned
  • Key results including how Discord saved over $200k in annual network spend

nodes.title: The death of network hardware appliances — and what it means for your cloud migration
nodes.description:
It’s time for a change.

When organizations need to protect their on-prem networks, IT departments typically turn to old, legacy hardware boxes.

These hardware boxes are expensive, hard to manage, and slow.

And now more than ever, the Internet is mission-critical: to share data, solve challenges, and stay connected. But as it increases in importance, you’re confronting greater network demands and a growing risk of cyber threats.

During cloud migration, many networking functions remain on-premise, creating capacity limitations, high total cost of ownership, support challenges, and security gaps. This webinar will outline those challenges, quantify their consequences, and propose cloud-based solutions for improving the speed, affordability, and security of hybrid cloud infrastructure.

Watch this on-demand webinar to learn how to:

  • Address the changing security, performance, and reliability needs for your organization
  • Reduce the total cost of ownership (TCO) in your data centers, and
  • Increase your operational agility with easy deployment and management of network services

Join Vivek Ganti as he examines many of the aspects of the on-premises to cloud transition.

nodes.title: Succeeding With Secure Access Service Edge (SASE)
nodes.description:
With the emergence of the Secure Access Service Edge (SASE), network and security professionals are struggling to build a migration plan for this new platform that adapts to the distributed nature of users and data. SASE promises to reduce complexity and cost, improve performance, increase accessibility and enhance security. The question is: How do you gain these benefits as you work towards implementing a SASE architecture?

Register now, and you’ll learn:

  • Why SASE should be less complicated than many vendors are making it
  • What to look for when evaluating a migration to a SASE platform
  • A 3 month, 6 month, and 12 month roadmap for implementation
  • How Cloudflare One, a purpose-built SASE platform, delivers on these promised benefits

nodes.title: DDoS Trends Magic Transit Webinar
nodes.description:
Magic Transit delivers network functions at Cloudflare scale— that's DDoS protection, traffic acceleration, and much more from every Cloudflare data center— for on-premise, cloud-hosted, and hybrid networks.

Join Cloudflare's product expert, Vivek Ganti as we analyze the Q3 DDoS Trends Report and how Magic Transit can be a key factor in combating these attacks.

nodes.title: La obsolescencia de los hardware de red y las implicancias para su migración a la nube
nodes.description:
Durante la migración a la nube muchas funciones de red permanecen en el centro de datos, lo que crea limitaciones de capacidad, un alto costo de propiedad (TCO), problemas de soporte y brechas de seguridad. La pandemia ha hecho evidente cómo la obsolescencia de los equipos de red profundiza estos problemas.

En este webinar se revisarán los principales desafíos en el tránsito a la nube y se propondrán soluciones para mejorar la velocidad, los costos y la seguridad para la infraestructura híbrida.

Los especialistas de Cloudflare, Carlos Silva y Oscar Pinzon, líderes con más de una década de experiencia en IT para diversas industrias, analizarán en la sesión, entre otros puntos:

  • Cómo ha evolucionado la infraestructura del datacenter
  • Cuales son los retos de los dispositivos de red en la migración a la nube
  • Qué solución se tiene para proteger una plataforma híbrida
  • Cómo reducir costos con la simplificación de la operación

nodes.title: Zero Trust para todos: maneiras de chegar lá rapidamente
nodes.description:
O trabalho remoto fez com que as superfícies de ataque se expandissem infinitamente e, agora mais do que nunca, as organizações precisam partir do pressuposto de que seu “castelo” já está comprometido. O conceito Zero Trust surgiu como uma estrutura de segurança atraente, criada para solucionar as falhas das abordagens de segurança existentes, baseadas em perímetro. É algo desejável, mas não inatingível.

Na Cloudflare, estamos tornando os complexos desafios de segurança mais fáceis de resolver. Desde 2018, o Cloudflare Access já ajudou milhares de organizações, de grande e pequeno porte, a dar seus primeiros passos em direção ao modelo Zero Trust.

Neste webinar, o Cloudflare para Equipes (Teams) compartilhará nosso ponto de vista sobre o que as organizações mais bem-sucedidas fazem em primeiro lugar durante sua jornada em direção ao modelo Zero Trust.

 Temas a serem abordados:

●      A estrutura Zero Trust e nosso modelo recomendado de segurança ZT

●      Como três organizações de diferentes tamanhos e níveis de desenvolvimento em termos de segurança implementaram o acesso Zero Trust

nodes.title: The Future of Video Streaming on The Edge With Serverless Computing, featuring FloSports
nodes.description:
In the dawn of the web, bringing an application online meant spinning up servers. The cloud has removed the need for developers to personally have to deal with servers, but still required managing remote servers (VMs). The promise of serverless is to allow developers to go a step further — just managing their code.

Tune in to learn how FloSports leverages Cloudflare’s serverless platform to customize their code and deploy it to the edge so viewers across the world can seamlessly watch their live sports streaming. Listen to serverless experts from FloSports and Cloudflare as they discuss:

  • Using serverless architecture to protect against piracy
  • Building faster, scalable applications that eliminate buffering and latency
  • Simplifying the experience of developers as they build more complex applications
  • The future of what’s possible to build with serverless computing and video streaming

Accelerate Application & Network Security for Banking and Microfinance
nodes.description:
The past few months have seen significant changes in the cybersecurity landscape. When left undetected, these cybersecurity threats can steal sensitive personal customer and banking information, take over your accounts, negatively impact your revenue and permanently damage your brand.

Cloudflare and eCam Solutions invite you to attend this webinar to explore new data on cyber attack trends and discuss ways to counter these tactics. Join this webinar to:

  • Learn how cyber attack vectors and tactics are evolving 
  • Watch a live attack simulation (demo session WAF, DNS, Bot Management)
  • Learn strategies for responding to these trends, with real-world case studies 
  • Know key parameters to consider when picking a cyberthreat mitigation vendor 

Win a prize when you join us! Stay on for the Q&A session to win a prize! Three (3) surprise gifts will be up for grabs!
