nodes.title: The death of network hardware appliances — and what it means for your cloud migration
nodes.description:
During cloud migration, many networking functions remain on-premise, creating capacity limitations, high total cost of ownership, support challenges, and security gaps. This webinar will outline those challenges, quantify their consequences, and propose cloud-based solutions for improving the speed, affordability, and security of hybrid cloud infrastructure.

The session will explore many aspects of the on-premises to Cloud transition.

nodes.title: Zero Trust Summit
nodes.description:
A major architectural shift in how security teams will protect data is underway, and Cloudflare is leading the transition. Join us for a technology summit on the future of Zero Trust security. Attendees will get an exclusive first look at all-new Cloudflare for Teams capabilities that will help organizations of all sizes protect corporate data without compromising on speed or performance.

This is the keynote event of Zero Trust week, a week of surprising new product launches focused on helping you embrace Zero Trust security posture.

Agenda:

  • Introducing a new vision for Zero Trust security on Cloudflare's programmable edge network
  • Live demo: trust no connection - new ways to secure Internet traffic from managed or unmanaged devices
  • Live demo: getting started with Zero Trust access to SaaS applications
  • Q&A

nodes.title: Cloudflare ANZ Online Birthday Celebration
nodes.description:
It's Cloudflare's 10th birthday this year and the ANZ team would love to invite you to check out our online birthday celebration that happened recently!

The session will begin with James Allworth, Head of Innovation, Cloudflare, as we explore what disruption can teach us in the age of COVID-19. James is the author of "How Steve Jobs Solved The Innovator's Dilemma" on Harvard Business Review and he will take us through how some leading companies are innovating and disrupting their respective fields during the pandemic. Tough times never last, but tough people do.

Next up, hear from our cyber security superstar Troy Hunt, the leading Australian web security expert who created Have I Been Pwned?, a data breach search website that allows non-technical users to see if their personal information has been compromised. Troy will share his insights on recent data breaches in ANZ and we will open up for an interactive game session on cyber security hot topics that are keeping professionals up at night.

Lastly, we will wrap up with Jen Taylor, Chief Product Officer, Cloudflare, who will share with you all our Birthday Week product releases and how we are helping to build a better Internet.

Enjoy the session! 

Cheers, Cloudflare ANZ Team

nodes.title: Recent DDoS attack trends, and how you should respond - ANZ
nodes.description:
The past few months have seen significant changes in global DDoS tactics. We can observe these changes in detail by analyzing traffic patterns from Cloudflare’s global network, which protects more than 27 million Internet properties and blocks 45 billion cyber threats every day. What approaches are DDoS attackers using right now, and what are forward-thinking organizations doing in response?

In this webcast, Cloudflare DDoS product experts Naveen Singh, Solutions Engineer and Raymond Maisano, Head of APAC, will explore new data on DDoS trends and discuss ways to counter these tactics.

Join Cloudflare to learn more about:
- The recent DDoS Attacks in ANZ
- Strategies for responding to these trends, with real-world case studies
- Key parameters to consider when picking a DDoS mitigation vendor

nodes.title: Zero Trust for everybody: 3 ways to get there fast
nodes.description:
The COVID-19 pandemic has exposed the weaknesses of the traditional ‘castle-and-moat’ security model. Remote work has expanded attack surfaces infinitely outwards, and more than ever, organizations need to start from the assumption that their ‘castle’ is already compromised. Zero Trust has emerged as a compelling security framework to address the failures of existing perimeter-based security approaches. It’s aspirational, but not unachievable.

At Cloudflare, we’re making complicated security challenges easier to solve. Since 2018, Cloudflare Access has helped thousands of organizations big and small take their first steps toward Zero Trust.

In this webinar, Cloudflare for Teams will share our perspective on what the most successful organizations do first on their journey to Zero Trust.

We’ll cover:

  • The Zero Trust framework, and our recommended ZT security model
  • How 3 organizations of differing size and security maturity have implemented Zero Trust access
  • Cloudflare’s Zero Trust implementation and lessons learned

nodes.title: LendingTree and Cloudflare: Ensuring zero trade-off between security and customer experience
nodes.description:
Maintaining the right balance between security and customer experience is always challenging for online businesses. This challenge becomes even more relevant during this crisis as businesses face unprecedented levels of traffic and attacks.

Tune in to learn how LendingTree leverages Cloudflare to strengthen their security posture while ensuring a superior online experience for their customers. Listen to security experts from LendingTree and Cloudflare as they discuss:

  • Emerging attack vectors and tactics impacting online platforms
  • Best practices for online businesses to overcome these threats
  • How LendingTree leverages Cloudflare to maintain the right balance between security and business objectives

About LendingTree
LendingTree is the largest online lending marketplace for various financial borrowing needs including auto loans, small business loans, personal loans, credit cards, and more.

nodes.title: Network Transformation: How to Stay Secure and Reduce Cost When Migrating to the Cloud (APAC)
nodes.description:
Network transformation – the process of moving networking functions to the cloud – is an important and often-overlooked element of an organization’s cloud migration journey. It gives IT teams greater agility and solves many security and performance issues that stem from hybrid, heterogeneous network infrastructure.

But what does network transformation look like in practice? What challenges can impede it? And what benefits can it provide? Register for this webinar to learn:

  • How network transformation can improve the security, performance, and reliability of on-premises, hybrid, and multi-cloud infrastructure
  • How several companies have approached network transformation and what they've learned
  • Key results including how Discord saved more than $200K in annual network spend

nodes.title: Cloudflare ANZ Game Changers - Matt Moran
nodes.description:
If you have visited Australia, You may have tasted his creations at the famed ARIA and Chiswick restaurants or enjoyed watching his exploits on-screen via Australia's Masterchef.

The Cloudflare ANZ team had recently organised a live cooking demonstration with Australia's very own Executive Chef, Matt Moran, as he brings us a culinary masterclass from his own kitchen for Cloudflare's Game Changer series.

Watch on-demand as Matt joins us for an exclusive Q&A on leadership, innovation, and building the right mindset for success. Matt will also be providing a masterclass as he lets go of some of his famed secrets by preparing several dishes during the session.

The session will run for 90-minutes, and you are encouraged to try and replicate some of Matt's Masterpieces.

Do not miss this unique opportunity to connect with a true artist of the kitchen and business visionary.

nodes.title: Beschleunigen Sie Ihre digitale Transformation
nodes.description:

Während CDNs für viele Unternehmen eine Schlüsselrolle bei der Behebung globaler Netzwerklatenzen übernommen haben, sind mit diesen Lösungen neue Herausforderungen entstanden, die einen agilen Arbeitsstil behindern.

Sehen Sie sich jetzt unser Webinar an und erfahren Sie mehr über:

  • Grundlagen zur Verbesserung der Web-Performance
  • Wie sich der Markt für Web-Performance entwickelt und welchen Herausforderungen sich CDN-Nutzer stellen
  • Wie Cloudflare Ihre digitale Transformation unterstützt

nodes.title: El nuevo normal y cómo mitigar el incremento de Ciberataques durante COVID-19
nodes.description:
En el nuevo normal, las aplicaciones online y los medios de telecomunicaciones son fundamentales para sostener la conectividad. La crisis del COVID-19 ha creado una ventana de oportunidad para ciberataques dirigidos a estas aplicaciones y a sectores vulnerables en LATAM.

Los expertos de Cloudflare Latinoamérica cubrirán cómo detectar y mitigar el aumento de ciberataques durante esta crisis.

Participa en nuestro webinar para aprender lo siguiente:

  • Qué es un ataque DDoS y cuánto puede costar
  • Tendencias de ataques de DDoS y que significa para diferentes organizaciones
  • Cómo monitorear y mitigar ataques DDoS de varios tipos y tamaños

nodes.title: クラウドフレアでセキュリティ対策とコスト削減
nodes.description:
エンタープライズセキュリティの構築はコストがかかり、複雑で管理が大変だと言われています。 また、最近ではSQLインジェクションやクロスサイトスクリプティング、セロデイ攻撃、最新の脅威など高度化の一途をたどるサイバー攻撃に多くの企業は悩まされており、 セキュリティ強化は必須となっております。Webアプリケーションの「セキュリティ対策」と「コスト削減」を同時に実現できるのがクラウドフレアの統合型ソリューションです。

今回のセッションでは、クラウドフレアを活用して、 どのようにコストの削減できるのか、パフォーマンスを犠牲にせずにセキュリティの強化ができるのか、 またシンプルで管理が簡単な設定方法に関してご紹介します。

nodes.title: Parando Ataques DDoS no Brasil
nodes.description:
Ataques DDos estão evoluindo no Brasil e no mundo. Detectar e mitigar estes ataques rapidamente e precisamente é a estrategia principal para garantir a continuidade dos seus negocios.

Assista a este webinar para aprender:

  • O que é um ataque DDoS e quanto pode custar a você
  • Topicos de ataque local e global e o que significa para você
  • Como monitorar e mitigar ataques DDoS de todos os tamanhos e tipos

nodes.title: Why you should replace your DDoS mitigation box with Cloudflare (APAC)
nodes.description:
It’s time for a change.

When organizations need to protect their on-prem networks, IT departments typically turn to old, legacy hardware boxes.

These hardware boxes are expensive, hard to manage, and slow.

And now more than ever, the Internet is mission-critical: to share data, solve challenges, and stay connected. But as it increases in importance, you’re confronting greater network demands and a growing risk of cyber threats.

Attend this webinar to learn how to:

  • Protect and accelerate your networks
  • Reduce the total cost of ownership (TCO) in your data centers, and
  • Increase your operational agility with easy deployment and management of network services

nodes.title: Post COVID-19: Key Security Lessons Learned and Next Steps
nodes.description:
The global pandemic is forcing global business leaders to rapidly pivot to remote work styles, and to ensure their infrastructure is able to handle the resulting massive surge in Internet activity. CIOs, CISO, and CSOs are being challenged now more than ever to demonstrate efficiency and agility to drive positive business outcomes in the face of increasing uncertainty.

Join Joe Sullivan, CSO, and Arun Singh, Product Marketing Manager of Cloudflare, for an interactive webinar as we explore the most recent cybersecurity breaches, predict the key security issues for 2020 and discuss current security priorities.

About Joe Sullivan:
Joe Sullivan joined Cloudflare as its first Chief Security Officer in 2018. Previously, he was the CSO at Uber and Facebook, and held security and legal roles at eBay and PayPal. Joe also served with the U.S. Department of Justice as a prosecutor in the Silicon Valley U.S. Attorney's Office, where he was focused on technology-related crimes. In 2016, he served on President Obama's Commission on Enhancing National Cybersecurity. Joe works with several organizations that promote Internet safety and security and has been an active investor and advisor to technology start-ups.

nodes.title: Set up Zero Trust Access - and ditch your VPN - in less than 45 minutes (APAC)
nodes.description:
This webinar is an end-to-end live demonstration of how a fictional company could set up Zero Trust Access in less than 45 minutes. Product Manager Sam Rhea will walk through every configuration step, from integrating identity sources, to securing your first application, to testing the experience with contractors and employees.

The global explosion of remote work revealed what we suspected it might: corporate VPNs are slow, bad on mobile, and prone to compromise. Zero Trust Access replaces VPN connections with an identity-aware protection layer that sits in front of your company’s internal resources — and checks for employees’ SSO credentials instead of a VPN client.

Zero Trust might be a buzzword, but its benefits are real, and we believe it should be radically simple for teams to deploy and adopt. Join us to watch it happen in real-time, and get your ZTA questions answered live by product experts.

Cloudflare’s Zero Trust Access product, Cloudflare Access, is available at no cost for businesses of any size until September 1. To learn more and request a free onboarding session, visit: teams.cloudflare.com/access.

filters.name: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce

nodes.title: Cybersecurity 2020 threat landscape and its implications
nodes.description:
Cybersecurity decisions have direct implications to individuals, enterprises and organizations but also have broader societal implications than ever before. In 2020 and beyond, technology promises to change our own experience and enhance our way of life, and those of our customers, significantly. This reliance and targeting have been magnified during COVID19, where the cybercriminals have sunk to new lows at the same time as that reliance on tech has increased.

This session will explore how these technologies are going to change the experiences of our lives for the better and for the worse. It will explore the most recent cybersecurity breaches, predict the key security issues for 2020 and discuss current security priorities.

nodes.title: Why Modern Architecture Requires Modern Protection
nodes.description:
It’s no secret that securing a modern enterprise means keeping up with a vast and constantly shifting landscape of threats. However, this task is made exponentially harder when businesses are forced to rely on traditional, appliance-based security systems that route everything through a single choke point within your data centre.

Cloud technology is critical to most organisations’ IT networks, but many are failing to use the cloud to effectively defend them. Join Cloudflare Head of Solutions Engineering, APAC, James Ball, to find out how customers can leverage the scale and intelligence of cloud computing to make their security systems as effective and performant as the rest of their networks.

nodes.title: Cybersecurity 2020 threat landscape and its implications
nodes.description:
Cybersecurity decisions have direct implications to individuals, enterprises and organizations but also have broader societal implications than ever before. In 2020 and beyond, technology promises to change our own experience and enhance our way of life, and those of our customers, significantly. Society and humanity increasingly depend on tech to work, learn, vote, transact and socialise. But that dependence is also making our technology, and us, targets. This reliance and targeting have been magnified during COVID19, where the cybercriminals have sunk to new lows at the same time as that reliance on tech has increased.

This session will explore how these technologies are going to change the experiences of our lives for the better and for the worse. It will explore the most recent cybersecurity breaches, predict the key security issues for 2020 and discuss current security priorities specific to Asia Pacific.

nodes.description:
This webinar is an end-to-end live demonstration of how a fictional company could set up Zero Trust Access in less than 45 minutes. Product Manager Sam Rhea will walk through every configuration step, from integrating identity sources, to securing your first application, to testing the experience with contractors and employees.

The global explosion of remote work revealed what we suspected it might: corporate VPNs are slow, bad on mobile, and prone to compromise. Zero Trust Access replaces VPN connections with an identity-aware protection layer that sits in front of your company’s internal resources — and checks for employees’ SSO credentials instead of a VPN client.

Zero Trust might be a buzzword, but its benefits are real, and we believe it should be radically simple for teams to deploy and adopt. Join us to watch it happen in real-time, and get your ZTA questions answered live by product experts.

nodes.title: 為您的網站和應用程序打造難以穿越的防禦屏障
nodes.description:
如今的網路世界充滿各式各樣的在線攻擊 ，Web應用程序攻擊也己經變得更加複雜，並利用了多種高級攻擊策略。同時，由於更多公共API、系統轉移到雲端，以及日益增加的第三方集成，使客戶受到更大的攻擊風險。Cloudflare創建了互鎖的(Interlocking)應用程序安全解決方案套件，比如DDoS 防護，和TCP/UDP應用程序防護。這些工具結合在一起，可以在您的網站和應用程序周圍打造難以穿透的防禦屏障，為您的互聯網資源提供基於雲的、永遠在線的安全保障!

註冊參加Cloudflare 網路直播研討會系列，主題內容包含：

  1. 網路威脅日益嚴重，企業架構面臨哪些挑戰?
  2. 如何針對現代分散式攻擊做防護?
  3. 如何保護網站伺服器，和其他 TCP/UDP應用？
  4. 如何在保證速度和性能的前提下，保證您的企業網路擁有安全且可靠的維運?

nodes.title: Trade-off 없이 안전하고, 빠르고, 신뢰할 수 있는 네트워크를 구축하십시오.
nodes.description:
애플리케이션, 스토리지 및 컴퓨팅 계층은 이미 클라우드로 이동했지만 네트워크 계층은 여전히 온프레미스와 클라우드 기반 솔루션의 조합으로 관리되고 있습니다. 회사들은 하드웨어 기반 네트워크 장비를 구매해야 하는 일이 많은데, 이는 보안, 성능, 안정성에 대한 인터넷의 기본 요구 사항을 충족시키지 못하는 일이 많습니다. 하드웨어 장비는 고비용입니다. 전용 하드웨어 배포에 따른 비용이 발생하고 이 솔루션을 관리하는 인건비도 발생합니다.

해결책은 무엇인가요? 온프레미스, 퍼블릭 클라우드, 하이브리드 환경 모두에서 보안, 성능, 안정성을 제공하는 글로벌 클라우드 플랫폼입니다. 클라우드에 즉시 배포하고, 회사가 CAPEX 모델에서 OPEX 모델로 전환할 수 있도록 지원하는 가상 네트워크 기능을 이용하면 기업은 네트워크 아키텍처의 유연성을 높일 수 있습니다.

Cloudflare의 솔루션 엔지니어인 Jean Ryu가 진행하는 이 웨비나에 참석하셔서, 이 솔루션을 이용해 보안, 성능, 안정성을 희생하지 않으면서 TCO를 낮추고 배포와 네트워크 서비스 관리를 용이하게 하는 방법을 알아보십시오.

nodes.title: Monitoring and mitigating DDoS attacks with precision and speed
nodes.description:
DDoS attacks are evolving. Detecting and mitigating attacks quickly and accurately is a key strategy to ensure business continuity.

Join this webinar to learn about:

  • What is a DDoS attack and what it can cost you
  • Global DDoS attack trends and what it means to you
  • How Cloudflare Magic Transit and Kentik together monitor and mitigate DDoS attacks of all sizes and kinds

nodes.title: Key essentials for building fast and reliable applications (APAC)
nodes.description:
COVID-19 continues to impact people and businesses around the world. During these difficult times, your online presence is the only bridge connecting your business to customers and prospects. Losing your customers due to application downtime or slow response time can prove to be a costly mistake — a mistake that can be easily avoided.

Join this webinar to learn more about:

  • How application availability and performance is getting disrupted during the COVID-19 crisis
  • How our customers are leveraging Cloudflare Load Balancing to make their applications reliable and faster

nodes.title: Our journey to data centers in over 200 cites (and how we protect our own networks) (APAC)
nodes.description:
From London to Thimphu, Cloudflare has a physical presence in over 200 cities across 90+ countries. Our network is less than 100 milliseconds of 99% of the Internet-connected population in the developed world (for context, the blink of an eye is over 300 ms.)

Every server, in every data center in every city, runs every service that Cloudflare offers to increase the security, performance, and reliability of the 26 million Internet properties on our network.

Join this webinar to learn about our journey over the last decade building and securing our own data centers.

In this webinar, Nitin Rao, Cloudflare's Head of Global Infrastructure, and Anand Guruprasad, Cloudflare Solutions Engineer, will talk about:

  • Our network design – How we've built our network to be able to grow capacity quickly and inexpensively allowing us to move traffic across our network efficiently
  • Cloudflare's Network Flywheel – A glimpse into our network architecture that gets more flexible, scalable, and efficient as it expands
  • How we've built resilient systems in place to secure our data centers from threats

nodes.title: 악성 봇의 허상과 실상
nodes.description:
오늘날 전체 인터넷 트래픽의 40%에 달하는 양은 실제 유저가 아닌, 웹사이트와 앱을 이용하는 봇에 의해 만들어집니다. 유감스럽게도 이러한 봇 트래픽의 대부분은 악성입니다. 악성 봇이 널리 확산되고 정교해지면서, 실 트래픽과 허위 트래픽을 판단하기 어려운 경우가 생기고, 악성 봇이 비즈니스에 어떻게 영향을 줄 수 있는지 그리고 이를 막기 위해 무엇을 할 수 있는지에 대해 이해하기 어려워지고 있습니다.

Cloudflare의 솔루션 엔지니어 Jean Ryu와 함께 악성 봇에 대한 흔한 오해들을 짚어보고, 방어를 위해 더 많은 정보를 활용함으로써 조직을 봇으로부터 지킬 수 있는 방법을 알아보세요.

nodes.title: Best practices for CIOs to ensure business continuity during this pandemic (APAC)
nodes.description:
These times are unprecedented. During this COVID-19 crisis, every CIO's key goal is to maintain business continuity — enable all employees, customers, partners, and vendors to continue working and collaborating seamlessly.

Join Juan Rodriguez, Cloudflare's CIO, and Gaurav Mallawat, Cloudflare Solutions Engineer, to learn more about:

  • The key essentials for ensuring business and IT continuity during this crisis
  • How CIOs should prioritise, prepare, and respond in a fast yet effective manner
  • How to adopt and enable a secure remote workforce model

nodes.title: Cybersecurity na America Latina durante o COVID-19
nodes.description:
O tráfego da Internet está mudando, resultado do COVID-19. Estamos verificando um incremento de 10 a 30% de tráfego global incluindo na America Latina.

Os especialistas da Cloudflare America Latina vão discutir os impactos que estamos mitigando com a nossa rede e como você poderá gerenciar segurança e performance durante a crise atual nas suas aplicações WEB e infraestrutura.

Assista estes webinar de 45 minutos para conhecer:

  • Estatisiticas e tópicos do tráfego na America Latina que verificamos em nossa rede.
  • Os principais desafios que os negócios estão enfrentado e garantindo a disponibilidade de serviços na era pandemica.
  • As melhores práticas que os negócios deveriam estar implementando para garantir que os seus sistemas sejam a prova de desastres.

nodes.title: Ciberseguridad en Latinoamérica durante COVID-19
nodes.description:
El uso de Internet está cambiando a través del mundo por COVID-19. Cloudflare está viendo un aumento del 10-30% tráfico global, incluyendo América Latina.

Los expertos de Cloudflare Latinoamérica analizarán el impacto que estamos viendo en nuestra red y cómo se pueden administrar las implicaciones de seguridad y performance en sus aplicaciones web e infraestructura durante esta crisis.

Participa en nuestro webinar de 45 minutos para aprender lo siguiente:

  • Mediciones y tendencias del tráfico en América Latina que vemos en la red Cloudflare.
  • Los desafíos que enfrentamos para garantizar la disponibilidad del servicio durante la era de la pandemia.
  • Las mejores prácticas que las empresas deberían implementar para garantizar que tus sistemas sean "a prueba de desastres".

nodes.title: DÉMO EN DIRECT: Libérez vous de votre VPN pour accéder à vos ressources avec Cloudflare for Teams
nodes.description:
Les récentes actualités dans le monde contraignent les entreprises à adopter des modèles de travail à distance et à réorganiser leur activité de manière rapide. Si vos opérations sont pénalisées par un VPN latent à cause de l'augmentation accrue de l'utilisation - ou si vous souhaitez simplement abandonner votre solution VPN - Cloudflare for Teams pourrait être votre solution. C'est pourquoi nous avons rendu Cloudflare for Teams gratuit pour les entreprises de toute taille jusqu'au 1er septembre.

Ce Webinar comprendra une démonstration en direct pour vous présenter comment protéger vos applications et infrastructures hébergées en interne - sans VPN. Nous partagerons également certains cas d'usage innovants adoptés par nos clients quant à leur utilisation de Cloudflare for Teams pour leurs applications.

La session en ligne est interactive, n'hésitez-pas à nous poser des questions pendant son déroulement.

nodes.title: Debunking Myths About Malicious Bots (APAC)
nodes.description:
Today, as much as 40% of all Internet traffic consists of bots: non-human users of websites and apps. Unfortunately, much of this bot traffic is malicious. And as malicious bots become more prevalent and sophisticated, truth and fiction sometimes blur together, making it difficult to understand how bad bots can impact your organisation — and what you can do to prevent them.

Join Sumit Bahl, Product Marketing Manager for Cloudflare, Poornaprajna Udupi, Chief Technology Officer at Good Money Group, and Anand Guruprasad, Solutions Engineer at Cloudflare, to take a closer look at some of the most common false assumptions about bad bots — and how your organisation can stay bot-free by taking a more informed approach to defense.

nodes.title: Debunking Myths About Malicious Bots
nodes.description:
Today, as much as 40% of all Internet traffic consists of bots: non-human users of websites and apps. Unfortunately, much of this bot traffic is malicious. And as malicious bots become more prevalent and sophisticated, truth and fiction sometimes blur together, making it difficult to understand how bad bots can impact your organization — and what you can do to prevent them.

Join Sumit Bahl, Product Marketing Manager for Cloudflare and Poornaprajna Udupi, Chief Technology Officer at Good Money Group to take a closer look at some of the most common false assumptions about bad bots — and how your organization can stay bot-free by taking a more informed approach to defense.

nodes.title: DDoS Protection: Middle East & Turkey Edition
nodes.description:
Over the past month alone, Cloudflare has mitigated over 80 billion security events targeting Middle East & Turkey internet properties.

Join us in this webinar to learn from Cloudflare's DDoS Protection Product Manager about the recent attacks, how Cloudflare's threat intelligence directly contributed to making the internet safer, and how Cloudflare is uniquely positioned to help protect you from DDoS attacks and cyber threats.

  • What is a DDoS attack
  • How Cloudflare protected Middle East & Turkey customers
  • How Cloudflare detects & mitigates DDoS attacks
  • How can you protect against DDoS attacks

nodes.title: No trade-offs: Building secure, fast, and reliable networks (APAC)
nodes.description:
While applications, storage, and compute have shifted to the cloud, networking continues to be a combination of on-prem and cloud. Companies are frequently forced to buy on-prem “band-aid” network perimeter boxes, which often fail to address the Internet’s fundamental needs for security, performance, and reliability. Band-aid boxes are expensive: there’s the cost of deploying specialized hardware and the headcount expense related to the people managing these solutions.

What’s the solution? A global cloud platform that delivers security, performance, and reliability across on-prem, public cloud, hybrid environments. Virtual network functions that deploy on-the-fly in the cloud and help companies move from a CAPEX model to an OPEX model—giving organizations more flexibility with network architecture.

Join this webinar, hosted by Cloudflare Solution Engineer, Xin Meng, and Customer Success Manager, Sophie Qiu, to learn how this solution will lower TCO and provide easier deployment and management of network services, all without compromising security, performance, or reliability.

nodes.title: Our journey to data centers in over 200 cites (and how we protect our own networks)
nodes.description:
From London to Thimphu, Cloudflare has a physical presence in over 200 cities across 90+ countries. Our network is less than 100 milliseconds of 99% of the Internet-connected population in the developed world (for context, the blink of an eye is over 300 ms.)

Every server, in every data center in every city, runs every service that Cloudflare offers to increase the security, performance, and reliability of the 26 million Internet properties on our network.

Join this webinar to learn about our journey over the last decade building and securing our own data centers.

In this webinar, Nitin Rao, Cloudflare’s Head of Global Infrastructure will talk about:

  • Our network design – How we’ve built our network to be able to grow capacity quickly and inexpensively allowing us to move traffic across our network efficiently
  • Cloudflare’s Network Flywheel – A glimpse into our network architecture that gets more flexible, scalable, and efficient as it expands
  • How we’ve built resilient systems in place to secure our data centers from threats

nodes.title: Cyber-Bedrohungen in der DACH Region und wie Sie Angriffe abwehren können
nodes.description:
In den vergangenen Monaten war die DACH Region erheblich von Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS)-Angriffen betroffen, bei denen besonders Banken, Nachrichtenseiten und Internet Service Provider (ISP) ins Visier genommen wurden.

Sehen Sie sich dieses Webinar an und erfahren Sie über die jüngsten Angriffe in der DACH Region und wie Cloudflare einzigartig positioniert ist, um Ihr Unternehmen vor DDoS-Angriffen und Cyber-Bedrohungen zu schützen.

  • Was ist ein DDoS-Angriff?
  • Wie Cloudflare DACH-Kunden vor DDoS-Angriffen schützt
  • Wie Cloudflare DDoS-Angriffe erkennt und abschwächt
  • Wie können Sie sich vor DDoS-Angriffen schützen?

nodes.title: DDoS Protection: Northern Europe Edition
nodes.description:
Watch this on demand webinar with Cloudflare's DDoS Protection Product Manager about recent attacks on Northern European internet properties, how Cloudflare's threat intelligence directly contributed to making the internet safer, and how Cloudflare is uniquely positioned to help protect you from DDoS attacks and cyber threats.

  • What is a DDoS attack
  • How Cloudflare protected Northern European customers
  • How Cloudflare detects & mitigates DDoS attacks
  • How can you protect against DDoS attacks

nodes.title: Best practices for CIOs to ensure business continuity during this pandemic
nodes.description:
These times are unprecedented. During this COVID-19 crisis, every CIO’s key goal is to maintain business continuity — enable all employees, customers, partners, and vendors to continue working and collaborating seamlessly.

Join Juan Rodriguez, Cloudflare’s CIO, to learn more about:

  • What are the key essentials for ensuring business and IT continuity during this crisis
  • How CIOs should prioritize, prepare, and respond in a fast yet effective manner
  • How to adopt and enable a secure remote workforce model

nodes.title: How Are Websites Adapting to Surging Demand? Get Best Practice Tips & Avoid 6 Common Misconceptions
nodes.description:
Learn how the COVID-19 emergency is impacting online commerce for businesses around the world, and how you can adapt to the evolving ‘new normal’ - while avoiding these common misconceptions:

Auto-scale will take care of traffic peaks. Our site isn’t big enough to be targeted for an attack. We can quickly bring our site back online, Improving performance and scale is too complicated and expensive. Our hosting provider has adequate security. This is temporary - things will be back to normal soon.

Join Henrik Bjergegaard from Queue-it and Derek Yee from Cloudflare to hear stories and actionable advice from the frontlines of a changed eCommerce world.

nodes.title: The Big Surge: How to build a more resilient and available web infrastructure (APAC)
nodes.description:
Internet usage around the world is shifting as a result of COVID-19. We are seeing an increase of 10-30% traffic across the board. As companies face a sudden surge in traffic, it is important that they ensure the availability of critical systems that serve their customers and employees.

Join John Graham Cumming, CTO of Cloudflare, and Chris Wang, Solutions Engineer, as we discuss the impact we're seeing on our network and how you can manage the long-term implications of the current crisis on your web applications and infrastructure.

Join this webinar to learn the following:

  • Insights and trends we are seeing on the Cloudflare network.
  • How the Internet was built to withstand the increased global workloads
  • The challenges businesses are facing ensuring service availability during the pandemic era
  • Best practices that businesses should be implementing to ensure that their systems are "disaster proof"

nodes.title: Key essentials for building fast and reliable applications
nodes.description:
COVID-19 continues to impact people and businesses around the world. During these difficult times, your online presence is the only bridge connecting your business to customers and prospects. Losing your customers due to application downtime or slow response time can prove to be a costly mistake — a mistake that can be easily avoided.

Join this webinar to learn more about:

  • How application availability and performance is getting disrupted during the COVID-19 crisis
  • How our customers are leveraging Cloudflare Load Balancing to make their applications reliable and faster

nodes.title: Key considerations for CISOs and security teams during the Coronavirus emergency (APAC)
nodes.description:
The global pandemic is forcing global business leaders to rapidly pivot to remote work styles, and to ensure their infrastructure is able to handle the resulting massive surge in Internet activity. CIOs, CISO, and CSOs are being challenged now more than ever to demonstrate efficiency and agility to drive positive business outcomes in the face of increasing uncertainty.

Join Joe Sullivan, CSO, and Arun Singh, Product Marketing Manager of Cloudflare, for an interactive webinar where we explore:
•The most recent cybersecurity breaches•Predict the key security issues for 2020•Discuss current security priorities

nodes.title: The Big Surge: How to build a more resilient and available web infrastructure
nodes.description:
Internet usage around the world is shifting as a result of COVID-19. We are seeing an increase of 10-30% traffic across the board. As companies face a sudden surge in traffic, it is important that they ensure the availability of critical systems that serve their customers and employees.

John Graham Cumming, CTO of Cloudflare discusses the impact we’re seeing on our network and how you can manage the long-term implications of the current crisis on your web applications and infrastructure.

Watch this 45-minute webinar to learn the following:

  • Insights and trends we are seeing on the Cloudflare network.
  • How the Internet was built to withstand the increased global workloads
  • The challenges businesses are facing ensuring service availability during the pandemic era
  • Best practices that businesses should be implementing to ensure that their systems are “disaster proof”

nodes.title: Making remote access faster and safer from anywhere (APAC)
Making remote access faster and safer from anywhere (ANZ)
Cyber-Security für unterwegs? Cloudflare for Teams macht's möglich
nodes.description:
Seit vielen Jahren wurde das Unternehmens-VPN eher als notwendiges übel angesehen, anstatt als wertvoller Teil des IT-Bestands des Unternehmens. VPN-Appliances galten für den Zugriff auf Unternehmenstools und -ressourcen außerhalb des Büros als unerlässlich, dennoch waren sie oft langsam, umständlich und schwierig zu bedienen. Darüber hinaus eignen sich VPN-Appliances oft nicht für die hohen Anforderungen, die moderne SaaS-Anwendungen, auf die sich viele Unternehmen verlassen, an sie stellen.

Glücklicherweise sind Unternehmen nicht mehr auf physische VPN-Appliances angewiesen; sie können die Leistung der Cloud nutzen, um ihre Mitarbeiter zu authentifizieren und zu schützen, egal wo sie sich weltweit befinden.

Registrieren Sie sich jetzt für unser Webinar mit Henry Heinemann und Maik Pietsch, um herauszufinden, wie Cloudflare for Teams remote Geräte, Netzwerke und interne Anwendungen ohne Leistungseinbußen schützen kann. Das Webinar beinhaltet auch eine Live-Demo, die zeigt, wie Sie unser Produkt einfach konfigurieren können, um Ihre intern gehosteten Anwendungen und Infrastruktur zu schützen - ganz ohne VPN.

nodes.title: Key considerations for CISOs and security teams during the Coronavirus emergency
nodes.description:
During these unprecedented times caused by the rapid spread of COVID-19, security leaders and teams need to lead the way in preparing their companies to ensure the infrastructure and workforce stays secure. Key aspects of this webinar include:

  • How security leaders should prioritize, prepare and respond during current time of crisis
  • Attack trends that security teams should pay attention to
  • How to increase security awareness and implement solutions, to enable employees to work remotely in a secure way

nodes.title: LIVE DEMO: VPN-less Remote Access with Cloudflare for Teams
nodes.description:
The Coronavirus emergency is straining the infrastructure of companies around the world as more employees work from home. If your team is hamstrung by a VPN that can't handle the surge in usage — or you just have the itch to ditch your hardware-based VPN — Cloudflare is here to help.

This webinar will include a live demo showing how you can configure Cloudflare Access to protect your internally-hosted applications and infrastructure — without a VPN. We'll also share examples of how other organizations (including Cloudflare) are using it to make remote work faster and safer from everywhere.

nodes.title: It's 9AM... Do you know what's happening on your network?
nodes.description:
If you manage a corporate network, you’re responsible for protecting users from risky and malicious content online. Doing that well requires insight into the requests on your network, and the power to block risky content before it impacts your users. Legacy solutions have addressed this challenge by forcing the Internet through hardware onsite.

Cloudflare has a better way. The all-new Cloudflare Gateway (part of the Cloudflare for Teams family), provides secure, intelligent DNS powered by the world’s fastest public DNS resolver. With Gateway, you can visualize your Internet traffic in one place. And with 100+ security and content filters at your fingertips, you can apply comprehensive Internet intelligence to protect global office networks in a matter of minutes.

Join Irtefa, Product Manager for Cloudflare Gateway and AJ Gerstenhaber, Go to Market for Cloudflare for Teams, to discover a new way to protect your offices and teams from malware - no legacy firewalls required.

nodes.title: Learn how Grofers manages millions of malicious attacks leveraging Cloudflare Solutions
nodes.description:
The E-commerce industry relies heavily on having a seamless online application for its customers. But, it can be challenging for these companies to avoid an onslaught of unwanted traffic and mitigate DDoS attacks on their own.

This is the issue Grofers, an online grocery delivery service, was dealing with before they heard about Cloudflare. Now, Grofers uses Cloudflare's extensive global cloud platform and leverages our WAF solution and DNS services to enhance their security and provide a positive experience to their customers. Additionally, they can now ensure high availability for their application through using Cloudflare solutions.

During this webinar, we will be covering the following:

  • Challenges Grofers faced to keep its business online
  • Cloudflare's solution and results
  • Deep dive into Cloudflare services which can help the E-commerce industry
  • Q&A

Watch this webinar to learn more about how Cloudflare can provide simple solutions to prevent complex attacks.

nodes.title: Novedades de Cloudflare: Seguridad y Rendimiento
nodes.description:
Regístrese para aprender sobre los anuncios destacados de Cloudflare.

En este webinar, presentaremos los detalles técnicos de las más recientes tecnologías de rendimiento y seguridad que permiten acelerar y blindar sus dominios y aplicaciones de manera sencilla.

Cubriremos temáticas como mejoras al web application firewall (WAF), protección de DDoS al L4, y demostraremos un nuevo producto para la protección de la infraestructura de red. Posteriormente, usted podrá contactarse con nuestro equipo de especialistas.

nodes.title: グローバルスケールのセキュリティ対策とは
Novidades da Cloudflare: Segurança e Desempenho
nodes.description:
Registre-se para aprender sobre a Cloudflare e nossos últimos anúncios de produtos.

Neste webinar, abordaremos os detalhes técnicos das soluções de segurança e desempenho mais recentes que ajudarão você a acelerar e proteger seus sites e aplicativos.

Abordaremos tópicos como melhorias no firewall de aplicativos da web (WAF), proteção L4 DDoS e mostraremos uma nova versão do produto que ajuda a proteger sua infraestrutura de rede. Após o webinar, você poderá entrar em contato com nossa equipe.

nodes.title: Accelerate Your Digital Transformation
nodes.description:
In a highly competitive digital culture, businesses are intensifying their digital transformation efforts to expand their hybrid and multi-cloud cloud initiatives. As dependencies on legacy point solutions and architectures begin to diminish, developers are becoming increasingly influential in newly digitally transformed organizations.

The need for increased agility, and speed is paramount. While CDNs have been a key fixture for many enterprise businesses to remediate global network latencies, new challenges have arisen with these solutions that are inhibiting agile workstyles.

Join this 45-minute webinar to learn the following:

  • The foundations of improving web performance
  • How the web performance market is evolving and the challenges faced by adopters of CDN
  • How Cloudflare supports your digital transformation
